certification and product certification renowned for quality, integrity, and technical excellence. established more than 150 years ago in germany, t v s d is a leading global provider of technical services. more than 24,000 highly skilled employees across 1000 offices around the globe pool their multidisciplinary expertise to partner clients in their business processes, enhancing their competitive strength and delivering tangible economic added value. at t v s d we are passionate about technology. innovations impact our daily lives in countless ways, and we are dedicated to being a part of that progress. we test, we certify, we audit, we advise. we never stop challenging ourselves for the safety of society and its people. we breathe technology, we strive for professional excellence, and we leave a mark. we take the future into our hands. we are t v s d. #futureinyourhands job description as a data engineer intern, you will be responsible for converting large volumes of text-based data into structured databases. this will involve using various software tools and techniques to extract data from pdf documents and transform it into a structured format that can be easily analyzed and queried. you will work closely with other members of the ai team to ensure the accuracy and completeness of the data and to identify any potential issues or inconsistencies. key responsibilities: convert pdf files, word documents, and related webpages into structured databases using software tools and techniques. verify the accuracy and completeness of the extracted data. identify and resolve any issues or inconsistencies in the data. collaborate with other members of the ai team to ensure the quality and integrity of the data. monitor and report on the progress of the conversion process. troubleshoot and resolve any issues that may arise during the conversion process. ensure compliance with all company policies and procedures. learning outcomes: learn about essential ai standards and their usage across various industrial sectors. transfer learnings and techniques learned in school to the workplace. develop skills related to the development work such as data analytics, python, databases. key requirements: bachelor s degree in computer science, information science, or related field. proficient in microsoft excel and other data analysis tools familiarity with pdf data extraction and conversion tools such as adobe acrobat, abbyy flexicapture, or similar software strong attention to detail and analytical skills. excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot and resolve issues. familiarity with database management systems such as sql server, mysql, and mongodb is a plus. strong communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a team environment. ability to work independently and meet deadlines. application instructions please apply for this position by submitting your text cv using internsg. kindly note that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

architect - associate / professional aws certified developer - associate aws certified sysops administrator - associate aws certified devops engineer - professional strong english written and oral communication skills. ability to work with little or no management oversight or supervision.

and distributed systems.

you will be a thought leader in the company: driving mobile development best case practices, processes and standards throughout the company. supporting solution architects, scrum masters, and development teams with delivering react native, ios, and android mobile products to clients. we will rely on your technical leadership and ingenuity to stay up to date on the latest in mobile development (e.g native, flutter, reactnative, performance, etc) how do you know if you are a good fit? minimum 4 years of professional work experience with reactnative, typescript, good to have experience in swift and kotlin in-depth knowledge of at least one programming language like dart, javascript (reactjs) for reactnative, java/kotlin, or objc/swift understanding of build and deployment of ios and android app familiars with android, ios and cross platform design best practices familiars with automated build & deployment using fastlane or ci/cd platforms like codemagic, circle ci, github action are a definite plus. familiars with integrating plugins/modules from either android, ios and cross platform have a good understanding in connecting to third party apis platforms such as payment gateways, mail services, sms platforms, etc. monorepo development experience (such as nx) is a definite plus. backend development experience (java spring boot or nodejs) is a definite plus. have a good understanding of backend for apis integration (via restful, json, xml) to build a dynamic and sophisticated ui have an understanding of using graphql integration with frontend proficient with backend development and agile concepts is an advantage! have advanced knowledge of tdd, automated testing frameworks like jest (unit/integration test) is a must, detox (e2e) is a plus positive attitude, independent, inner drive to become successful good verbal and written communication skills in english. ability to talk to international clients. tech-savvy (up to date with latest trends) proactive, confident, doesn t shy away from responsibility, take full ownership exceptional analytical, debugging/ troubleshooting, coding skills, problem solving interest to work on multiple global corporate and startup projects, across different industries in an agency. ability to coordinate and communicate with diverse teams and individuals (e.g solution architects, product managers, scrum masters, developers, customer service, clients) ability to understand different business models and applications is a bonus keen interest in learning about other technologies (such as nodejs api development, python, serverless, ci/cd devops, etc) is a plus experience with working with clients is a plus and working in a product or software agency is a plus experience with qa, automated testing, ability to coordinate and communicate with diverse teams and individuals (e.g solution architects, scrum masters, developers, and clients) have a university degree of computer science and engineering and/or other equivalent degree why join us? at slash, we re proud of our collaborative culture; everyone is ready to lend a helping hand, whether it s your first day on the job or your thousandth. we also embrace a trust-centric culture, flexibility and accountability first, and a work-life integration mindset. check out our culture here and meet our legendary team! projects/clients: get the stability of a larger group and the excitement of a startup. work on interesting global projects, challenges and technologies for top brands, fast-paced startups and governments. experience working with a mature scrum team and day-to-day agile mindset project implementation. check out our success story! team and working environment: join our diverse remote builders community and hubs oriented in jakarta, bandung, yogyakarta, bali, yerevan, and phnom penh. experience an optimised remote working environment. benefit from the flexible remote work package options (work from home or work from a coworking space). learning: we focus on the growth of both parties. you will meet communities packed with intelligent peers and attend events with regular speakers, so you don t miss out on the latest tech trends. slash is a safe space for people to share if you re passionate about something. our favourite learning practices are the growth accountability group, mentoring program, venture club, and leadership. on top of your remuneration, you will get annual training or learning credits to be redeemed. we actively encourage everyone to suggest training beneficial for their professional growth. technology: we work on a wide-range of technologies: latest web and mobile technologies, ai, blockchain, latest cloud services, microservices & middlewares, security & infrastructure, etc.

b518db8a3e2455b24771716e0e0bb8c2dee11273.job_desc: holmusk, a 2019 world economic forum technology pioneer, is building a leading real-world evidence platform in mental health. we leverage data and advanced analytics to accelerate research and improve outcomes in psychiatry across pharma, healthcare providers, and payers. we are seeking an experienced nlp expert for the senior data scientist (nlp) position. the position will serve as the in-house expert for nlp algorithms applied to healthcare problems and would be responsible for driving the custom nlp projects/ solutions for enrichment of holmusk s real world behavioral health database. if this description excites you, come join a diverse and collaborative team of engineers, designers, data scientists, health and business professionals who are passionate about improving healthcare. responsibilities comprehend requirements for extraction of specific data from unstructured clinician's notes and be responsible for the complete life cycle of nlp model development, from problem definition and data collection to model training, validation, and deployment. work on developing nlp models in collaboration with junior data scientists which encompasses code review, maintenance of code repositories and code/ model versioning. work closely with cross-functional teams, including engineers, clinicians, and product managers, to integrate nlp solutions into broader systems and applications. responsible for creating material including model insights, use cases and publications as required by managers, and ensuring scientific rigor in model development. what we're looking for master's or ph.d. in computer science, data science,statistics, applied mathematics, bioengineering or related fields from recognised institutes. proven work experience of 3+ years in handling nlp projects. proficient in python/sql, solid programming skills. candidate with at least 3 to 4 years of experience in handling end to end nlp projects. proven hands-on experience in pre-training, fine-tuning of large language models like bert, gpt, llama etc. for nlp tasks like information extraction, ner and text classification. experience with continuous integration and deployment pipelines for machine learning/deep learning models. good working knowledge of tools and frameworks, including but not limited to tensorflow, pytorch, aws, mlops, docker, lang chain agents, and other relevant technologies. candidate who can stay abreast of the latest advancements in nlp and related tools and integrate them into the development process when applicable. preferred skills experience with generative ai and other specialized nlp techniques like prompt engineering, rag etc. knowledge of best practices in model explainability and interpretability especially in healthcare/biomedical domain. at holmusk we take pride in our diverse workforce and inclusive culture. we believe it takes all kinds of people to build the best products and bring real change to the healthcare space.

75dff55aac40557c3174fdb19b6542dc7ea9b97e.job_desc: key responsibilities: conduct research and develop microgrid power management and energy management algorithms. deploy power and energy management applications on microgrid controllers. develop ai/ml/dl solution platforms for various energy management applications. design sld, sizing, and integration of microgrid ders, protection circuits, and loads. prepare test cases and conduct microgrid functional, error tests both sil and on testbeds. emulate microgrids using tools such as power factory, matlab, or panda power and integrate with microgrid controller to carry out preliminary sil tests. requirements: bachelor, master s degree, or ph.d. in power systems, electrical engineering or equivalent, with minimum 2 years of experience. experienced in scripting python, matlab or equivalent. knowledge of operational principles of microgrids such as on-grid optimization, off-grid optimization, islanding, resynching, and blackstart operations ai, ml, dl related experiences in domains such as energy management, predictive analysis, forecasting, and anomaly detection is an added advantage,

bc9e458a9494bbc427c2b8158082d51c7356477c.job_desc: are you a node.js & javascript scripting specialist? skilled in working with javascript es6, html, css? with 2 years experience in digital marketing? and capable/comfortable with providing technical support to internal & external teams? then you are the ad-tech technical solutions engineer that this growing martech is looking for!!! the company: fast growing ai retargeting martech they are an award-winning martech company that provides state-of-the-art retargeting technology for top global brands. over the last few years, they have been consistently recognized as one of the fastest-growing international tech companies in sea they have been steadily expanding their footprint & team over the last few years. this is because they have their own proprietary ad buying engine powered entirely by deep learning algorithms. their one of a kind engine identifies potential buyers and boosts performance via 1:1 ultra-personalized retargeting; proving to be up to 50 per cent more efficient than standard machine learning ai-based approaches. to remain on the cutting edge, last year they launched two new divisions dedicated to inventing and developing new mar-tech solutions. they serve campaigns for more than 1,500 clients across apac, emea, and the americas regions. with offices in singapore, new york, london, tokyo, s o paulo, moscow, istanbul, dubai, and warsaw. the role: ad-tech solutions engineer as an ad-tech solutions engineer, you will be working hand in hand & assisting ad-tech support specialists, technical account & account managers. part of a 10-20 member ad-tech technical support team based in singapore, that services apac. however, you will be fairly self-reliant, needing to solve problems as efficiently as possible. as an ad-tech solutions engineer, you will have a mindset focused on crafting solutions to enhance your daily work & those that you support. this is a replacement role, reporting to european/hq based team leader, where you will : help to manage complex technical integrations, e.g. integrating with clients apis in order to fetch data frequently. build custom reports for clients by fetching data from our api & delivering to match client requests. manage custom configurations for technical support specialists. assist in building web apps to enable both technical account and account managers to perform their work easier. must have requirements to be considered as an ad-tech solutions engineer you will need to have: strong hands-on experience in javascript and node.js scripting; 2 years experience in digital marketing/online advertising industry; 1 year of experience in javascript es6, html, css; familiarity & knowledge of linux and bash; be up to date with the latest ad tech trends; able to start in less than two months; applicants need to be already based in singapore. plus points qualifications for you to stand out as an ad-tech solutions engineer it would be great of you have: previous experience in building node.js applications; experience with ui web frameworks (react/semanticui/vue or others); experience with sql databases; experience with versioning systems (git/gitlab); experience in retargetting & ecommerce industry 3+ years of experience in the digital marketing industry. got what it takes? does this role speak to you? is this the next step in your career? then apply now!

778d007efd5ccfebf600000e329fe5d5486a1de9.job_desc: overview the defence science and technology agency (dsta) brings you to the forefront of cybersecurity, digital transformation and engineering. from working on software development and systems integration to unmanned technologies and artificial intelligence, you can have an impact on singapore s defence. achieve your fullest potential with opportunities to build your technical expertise and hone your competencies in diverse domains. you can also expect an immersive learning experience, where you will work with bright minds and collaborate with global industry experts. dsta is recognised as one of the top 10 employers in the engineering & it sector, where our engineers and it professionals work alongside procurement specialists to deliver state-of-the-art capabilities for singapore s peace and security. opportunity dsta s modelling & simulation group is looking for software engineers interested in developing simulation applications in the military domain to support different areas of use cases such as scenario-based system integration lab, concept experimentation and ai & robotics verification and validation. what can the team offer you? our team: you will join a multi-disciplinary team of developers, architects and product managers who are passionate about creating meaningful and impactful simulation systems. it s a place where you can solve diverse, complex challenges, alongside thoughtful, intelligent individuals who lead with curiosity, empathy, and optimism. career opportunities: we work on different projects, ranging from experimentations to operational system development in different domains spanning across air, land and sea systems. you will also have the flexibility and whitespace to work on exciting side projects and hone your skillsets in different technical areas like artificial intelligence and internet of things (iot) other than modelling and simulation. at times, you will have the chance to share at brown bag sessions and townhalls, as well as collaborate with worldwide leading research institutes and industry commercial partners. professional development: there are numerous opportunities to grow and excel professionally in your career with us. from your first day with us, your onboarding experience includes mentorship, buddy system and technical courses to build your competencies and connect with colleagues on a personal level. on top of that, we work with dsta s in-house academy to curate courses taught by both industry professionals as well as in-house lecturers. culture: we encourage our community to bring their whole selves to work, respect the need for work-life balance and allow for autonomy in the software development process and your career. once here you will collaborate closely with product managers, ux designers, developers and other stakeholders to deliver valuable and impactful software that serves a suite of use cases. work in a multidisciplinary software development team to define technical requirements and architecture, scope tasks, and develop software applications geared towards usability, scale, robustness and performance. design and develop simulation modules to support scenario-based testing, integration as well as the conduct of virtual experimentation. exchange technical knowledge and experiences with like-minded developers. job requirements minimum qualifications bachelor s degree in computer science, computer engineering, electrical engineering or related fields. candidates with more than 2 years of relevant working experience may be considered for a senior software developer position. relevant experience and mindset knowledge in gaming and real-time simulation technologies: user interface game engines (e.g. unreal, unity, etc.) graphics, visuals and 3d content creation (e.g. blender, maya, or any other 3d modelling software) physics modelling behaviour modelling (e.g. ai and navigation) networking protocols object oriented-programming languages: c++, c# or java. good understanding of data structures, design patterns, algorithms and software design. have a passion for software development and technology. thrive in a team-oriented, project-based work environment. excellent analytical and communication skills including the ability to deliver technical concepts clearly across different audiences. have a passion for innovation and learning new software architectures, frameworks, languages and technologies. it would be a bonus if you have experience in agile (e.g. scrum or extreme programming) practices and software development lifecycle. ability to distill user needs and translate them to technical outcomes and documentation. knowledge of front-end development build and tools. knowledge of devsecops, ci/cd pipelines and code versioning tools such as git. knowledge of secure coding and cybersecurity. knowledge of 3d modelling tool. application instructions if this sounds like the right environment for you to grow and thrive, then we are looking forward to getting to know you! to apply, please submit your resume and cover letter. as dsta is an agency under ministry of defence, only singapore citizens will be considered. experience: 0 ~ 5 years job type full-time qualification bachelor's degree or equivalent working hours standard hours the defence science and technology agency (dsta) brings you to the forefront of cybersecurity, digital transformation and engineering. from working on software development and systems integration to unmanned technologies and artificial intelligence, you can have an impact on singapore s defence. achieve your fullest potential with opportunities to build your technical expertise and hone your competencies in diverse domains. you can also expect an immersive learning experience, where you will work with bright minds and collaborate with global industry experts. dsta is recognised as one of the top 10 employers in the engineering & it sector, where our engineers and it professionals work alongside procurement specialists to deliver state-of-the-art capabilities for singapore s peace and security. internship opportunities and a meaningful career await you. you may also email us at hrjobs@dsta.gov.sg if you have any enquiries pertaining to careers.

492f08bc50561042c63619bf313c6237e810dcef.job_desc: job description: participate in full development cycle of machine learning model, including design, data processing, develop, deploy, experiment and analyse. explore, improve and validate suitable cutting-edge algorithms and strategies for various business scenarios, and collaborate with engineering team, product team to meet the set goals. job requirements: master s degree (or phd) in computer science, ai, ee or other quantitative discipline. bachelor s degree with significant relevant experience will be considered. proficient in at least one or more of the programming languages, such as python, c++. familiar with spark, hive, tensorflow, etc. 2+ years of experience with one or more of the following domains, such as recommender system, search algorithm and ads algorithm, etc. experience with large dataset modelling in e-commerce or other industry field. possess strong analytical and problem-solving capabilities and keen to solve challenging problems.

e82d7c45a3ed75a6b8ae4fbe9635c28f0b3d0812.job_desc: what if you can safeguard the future of all technologies? today, most of the systems are connected, automated, and remotely monitored/controlled. be it industrial or commercial, automation with connectivity has a huge impact on evolving sectors including healthtech, industry 4.0, satellite, defense/military, 5g, and smart cities. these are prone to cyberattacks due to various limitations in computation, bandwidth, and advances in quantum computing. microsec (www.usec.io) is a fast-growing singapore based company that has built an enterprise cybersecurity platform that protects against such attacks by facilitating mathematical and computationally optimized encryption algorithms supporting post-quantum cryptography with machine learning. to protect from zero-day attacks, the platform also enables a machine-learning/ai-based anomaly detection system that can run on the smallest microcontrollers to the largest supercomputers. an incredible team of various scientists and engineers from across the world has joined the incredible journey to build this technology. the team is looking for its next rockstar candidates to take the company to the next level and safeguard the future of all technologies. microsec (www.usec.io) is looking for a technically inclined candidate with leadership skills for its fast-growing iot & ot cybersecurity. this person should be naturally very curious, loves technology, and is forward-thinker. this person will oversee technical aspects, guides architectural decisions, and empowers the development team, ensuring effective communication and successful delivery for microsec s iot cybersecurity products. what you ll do leading the core cybersecurity technical team define, manage and execute against the product and project roadmap write high quality code and scripts to achieve product roadmap and integration between components work with product owner to prioritize development and ensure that high-quality product is shipped on time lead the technical team to support development on backend, frontend, cloud, devops and embedded resolve issues faced by the team and support related activities play a key role in defining the architecture and engineering guidelines for the development team, and driving engineering practices based on these guidelines play the role of a cybersecurity leader and evangelist technical operations manage the technical infrastructure of the company manage on-prem and cloud applications associated with the company s product and services building fault-tolerant architecture for the product and associated infrastructure drive adoption of the common framework and champion the cause of reuse across various product features technical market research conduct market research to guide product strategy and identify opportunities for new products and use cases design and development of customer friendly solution execute product launches and go-to-market by working with marketing to produce compelling content and sales enablement assets evangelize product and drive customer adoption who you are you have a degree in computing / computer science / engineering or a related domain from a reputed university you have over 3 years of experience in managing a technical team of software developers you have over 6 years of experience in writing codes and building infrastructure you have a proven track record of working with cloud-based systems including aws, azure etc. and with on-prem server management you are experienced in python, linux shell, devsecops & gitlab ci/cd you are experienced in openssl, tls, pki and related cybersecurity technologies you are experienced in ids, firewall, and network devices including switches and routers you have proven track record of building solution architecture experienced in agile scrum development methodology ability to translate complex topics such as cryptography and machine learning into easy-to-understand value props excellent problem-solving skills ability to thrive in a fast-paced startup environment excellent verbal communication and writing skills required drive, self-motivation and a desire to excel product management experience with a b2b product a plus

f29a5864b8cdc60990547a4fb5de10bc7de9a9d4.job_desc: job responsibilities design and develop software for automated computer vision equipment software development for gui, big data management, real time socket communication design & develop image processing / computer vision algorithm development involve in software development life cycle job requirements masters / degree in engineering discipline. knowledge in programming skills in visual studio development environment is a plus proficient in programming language such as c++ and / or c# is preferred knowledge in deep learning(ai) for defect classification is a plus strong knowledge in image processing skill is required proficient in english both written and verbal communication we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. gmp technologies (s) pte ltd | ea licence: 11c3793 | ea personnel: lim zi cheng | registration no: r2089949

f03b34099526865a7e9c31446070a15d109fda50.job_title: [2024 graduate hire] gpu/apu physical implementation engineer (cai2/3)
f03b34099526865a7e9c31446070a15d109fda50.job_desc: [what you will do] - responsible for physical design and development activities of mediatek s ghz arm/imagination-based graphics processors, ai processors and neural network dsp - involve in activities encompass physical design and analysis of complex and timing-critical graphics processor ai processors and neural network dsp - technical disciplines include synthesis, floor-planning, place and route, rc extraction, timing and power optimization - implementation flow development - work closely with mediatek s colleagues in taiwan and singapore in implementation methodology co-development and flow deployment [are you the right talent?] - bachelor s/master s degree in electrical/computer engineering - knowledge in arm/img/tensilica processor familiarity, silicon debug and/or functional/direct test verification - familiar with assertion-based verification (sva) & system verilog language - knowledge in processor verification, fpga verification and/or formal verification - familiar with synopsys icc (preferred) or cadence or magma tools from netlists to gds is a plus - knowledge in graphics processor implementation/power reduction flows and methodology from rtl to gds (including synthesis, floor-planning, placement, cts, routing, timing optimization, physical verification) is a plus - knowledge of high-speed/low power ip and custom circuit design is a plus - familiar with power noise and reliability tools such as redhawk and voltus - good communication and scripting skills interested applicants, kindly send a copy of your cv and academic transcript to mail_resumesg@mediatek.com

b405bfa4ba1d8ffd4ccc31e41a2b25b0ea7ee54a.job_title: risk services - data trust services associate - 2024 intake
b405bfa4ba1d8ffd4ccc31e41a2b25b0ea7ee54a.job_desc: line of service assurance industry/sector fs x-sector specialism risk management level associate job description & summary we at pwc believe that challenges are better solved together. that's why you'll join a diverse, global community that comes together to build trust in society and solve important problems. with us, you are encouraged to lead with your heart and values, and where your skills are developed and put to work in exciting ways, superpowered by technology. how will you value-add: we aspire to build a team of data professionals with the ability to apply their knowledge in helping our clients solve their business challenges while future proofing their business. our practice is integrated across different pwc lines of services, and works collaboratively with our clients to manage engagements and lead teams of data and analytics resources in various aspects digital, data and analytics solutions choose your track: there are multiple tracks within our team where you can find your niche. candidates will be assigned to the relevant roles, listed below, based on their experience and expertise. please refer to the list below for a detailed description of the roles. track a: data engineering a data engineer is responsible for collecting, managing, and transforming raw data into information that can be consumed and interpreted downstream by end users, facilitated by data scientists and business analysts. your ultimate goal is to enable organizations to utilize their data for performance evaluation and optimization. here are some of the skills and experience you may need to be effective in your role: bachelor s degree and above in analytics, information systems management, computer science or related fields 0-1 year of experience depending on grade, in data integration strategy, data modeling, designing, building etls, data ingestions, and/or transformations interest in working with rdbms such as db2, oracle, microsoft sql server, postgressql, teradata, etc. knowledge in data integration or etl tools such as informatica powercentre, oracle data integrator, sap data services, ab initio, ibm datastage or microsoft ssis process good knowledge and experience in data quality definition, data cleansing and data treatment/profiling process using industry standard tools like informatica data quality, trillium software, sas data quality, sap data quality management, etc. is an advantage good knowledge of data warehouse and data management implementation methodology good conceptual knowledge of the data management frameworks, including operating model, data governance, data management, data security, data quality and data architecture experience in big data platforms like cloudera and hortonworks knowledge in cloud technologies including aws, azure, google cloud and their respective etl specific services (eg: aws glue) knowledge in cloud data warehouses like snowflake, redshift, synapse etc. knowledge in api management software design and build good knowledge of data visualisation concepts using tools such as tableau, microsoft powerbi, qlik, etc. interest in agile methodology implementation certification in any of database, data integration, data management, visualisation tools and cloud is an added advantage knowledge about the infrastructure paradigms such as os, network, etc. is an added advantage ability to pick up new tools and able to be independent with minimal guidance from the project leads/managers strong analytical and creative problem-solving capabilities ability to establish personal credibility quickly and demonstrate expertise must be able to stay up to date on the latest trends in data analytics, like data fabric, data lakehouse, data mesh to name a few. track b: data management and governance a data management professional develops and governs data-oriented systems designed to meet the needs of an organization or research team. data management includes accessing, validating, and storing data that is needed for research and day-to-day business operations. key areas of work include data quality, metadata and masterdata management, creation of data catalogues to name a few. here are some of the skills and experience you may need to be effective in your role: a degree in technology or business-related subject is recommended (e.g. business analytics, computer science, accounting, business management) 0-1 year of relevant experience, depending on the grade applied for knowledge in financial industry will be an added advantage strong technical and analytical skill sets possess good presentation skills, both oral and written ability to interact with various levels of internal and external stakeholders both in written and verbal forms good client management skills, authoritative and credible in a client conversation - both in terms of personal style and subject matter expertise strong problem-solving skills and an ability to prioritise and manage multiple task ability to lead teams under pressure with demonstrated experience in project management willing to listen to your client and discern the best course of action for them self-driven, curious, a fast-learner and a strong practitioner of self-development must be able to stay up to date on the latest trends in data analytics, like data fabric, data lakehouse, data mesh to name a few. conceptual understanding of various data platforms, including major cloud players like aws, azure and gcp a passion for client service and an ability to work from both the pwc singapore office and client sites track c: data science a data scientist s primary job, in simple terms, is to extract actionable insights of value from data. but we expect certain more skills and qualities in the data scientists who wish to join us, like ability to work with data to get it into proper form amenable for analysis which includes data preparation/wrangling and integration experience, feature engineering business acumen so that you are able to understand the business problem, translate the requirements into technical requirements and then ensure use cases you formulate see the light of the day read on only if you think you can deliver on both of the aforementioned aspects. how will you value add: using data science methods and artificial intelligence to enhance innovation, profitability and growth of our clients in three dimensions: (1) business innovation: design and implement innovative, data-driven business models, identification, conception and assessment of industry and client specific use cases, utilization of data-modeling and -analysis in every aspect of sales, marketing, operations and business-model innovation (2) big data and analytics: extract new insights from various data sources leveraging sophisticated machine learning and ai solutions (3) digital transformation: define and implement corporate transformation as well as strategy development towards a data-driven business leveraging data science, ai, ml and digital technologies work with business and tech to develop end-to-end advanced analytics solutions, from problem formulation, data sourcing to developing and deploying the solution into production understand the business domain and relevant dataset provide end-to-end advanced solutions to design, develop and deploy to production system build mlops, ci/cd practices to manage models regarding quick experiments and feedback loop and their ultimate operationalization communicate, interpret, execute analytics results and machine learning model details with business as well as technical stakeholders about you: phd, master s or bachelor's degree in statistics, economics, computer science or other relevant fields with deep theoretical knowledge in machine learning, data mining or statistical / mathematical modelling 0-1 year experience from leading consulting organizations and/or working on transformation projects and/or in-house consulting, with proven delivery success of data science and analytics related projects and transformation programmes. proven experience in projects related to data analytics, data science and digital transformation and up-to-date on methods and technologies related to data science, artificial intelligence/machine learning and automation practical experience in solving complex problems using scientific methods and modelling approach using experimental, statistical, machine learning and visualization techniques. clear and proven project delivery expertise and client-facing experience in singapore and/or asia identify, pursue and covert a pipeline of business development opportunities leveraging sharp intellect and strong problem-solving skills to address complex client challenges proven practical interest in statistical modelling, machine learning, text mining or data visualization for use cases including segmenting, customer value modelling, marketing optimization, campaign management, pricing, image and voice recognition, fraud detection, robotics and chatbots as well as real time data capture and evaluation. proficient in the technical skills such as sql, python, pyspark, ml packages and tools knowledge in business intelligence tools and relevant statistic tools/languages (e.g. r, python, sas) as well as data storytelling and visualization skills (e.g. with tableau or qlikview) other tools/cloud platform knowledge and experience valued: alteryx, gcp, azure, aws track d: bi and data visualisation specific responsibilities include but are not limited to: perform work across diverse industries and projects ranging from developing organisational strategies for analytics to building sophisticated data architectures and analytical models analyse and interpret large volumes of data from client data systems and external sources using proprietary and open source data tools, platforms and analytical tool kits translate complex findings into simple language and communicate them to internal and external stakeholders, such as your team members and clients executives deliver excellent client service and work from both the pwc singapore office and at client sites about you degree in business analytics, computer science, computer engineering, economics, engineering, information systems, sciences, mathematics, statistics, physic or other related disciplines that possesses an analytical and quantitative component from a reputable university strong communication skills and an awareness of global trends strong preference for basic competency in two or more of the following: an analytical software (e.g. r, sas) a data visualization tool (e.g. qlik, tableau, powerbi,) a relational or graph database management tool (e.g. sql, nosql, neo4j) programming (e.g. vba, c++, java, python) distributed architectures (e.g. hdfs, mapreduce, sqoop, flume, kafka, pig, hive) a self-driven learner with the ability to quickly learn and apply new tools and techniques such as proprietary analytical software, data models and programming languages an appreciation for structured methodical research, critical thinking and problem solving skills with an understanding for the application of these skills in the business environment a natural curiosity to identify, investigate and explain trends and patterns in data an ability to analyse and break down complex concepts and technical findings into clear and simple language for communication to team members and clients a passion for emerging technologies related to big data, machine learning and ai track e: data generalist / analytics focussed business analyst (ba) a business analyst plays a key role in across the lifecycle of an analytics project, by analyzing data and providing insights that can help the stakeholders make better business decisions. as a data generalist or a business analyst, you would often work closely with data analysts to collect, clean, and analyze data from various sources, and business stakeholders to elicit analytics requirements around use cases. the ability to wear multiple hats, translate business requirements into technical requirements, drive uats and test case scenarios, guide and manager the team delivering the data analytics project will be some of the key responsibilities in your job. about you someone who has interest in at least two of the below tracks: data engineering data management data science bi and data visualisation knowledge in creating and maintaining documents like business requirements document (brd), requirements traceability matrix (rtm), functional specification document (fsd) strong analytical and problem-solving skills, as well as the demonstrated ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and effectively. track record of providing ongoing support and guidance to stakeholders to help them understand and use data effectively, like conducting adoption trainings, hackathons etc. ability to collaborate with multiple stakeholders to identify and prioritize business needs interest in developing and implementing data collection and analysis processes evaluating data to identify areas for improvement and making recommendations to senior management at least a bachelor's degree in a related field, such as business management, engineering, economics, or statistics you will receive an email from us to complete pymetrics within 3 working days of your application submission. pymetrics is a series of engaging online games that will assess cognitive, behavioural and emotional traits. this allows us to learn more about you and gives us insights into where you will thrive the most in our business. note: please note we accept only one application per candidate . you may indicate your second preference in the same application. we recommend that you apply to your preferred position that closely aligns with your skills, passions and interests. you can indicate another role in the same application form. duplicate entries will slow down your application with us. kindly upload both your resume and degree audit or transcript in pdf format all under resume attachment upload kindly note only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. got a question? email to sg_graduate_recruitment@pwc.com . there have been reports of scammers impersonating pwc hr professionals contacting individuals about fraudulent job opportunities using non-pwc domain email addresses and an overseas number. please note that genuine communications from our hr team will only come from "@pwc.com" email address. #li-dni education (if blank, degree and/or field of study not specified) degrees/field of study required: degrees/field of study preferred: certifications (if blank, certifications not specified) required skills optional skills desired languages (if blank, desired languages not specified) travel requirements not specified available for work visa sponsorship? yes government clearance required? no job posting end date

b1aa524cbda7966b41d670e513d3fbde1bb2ceba.job_desc: shield is a device-first risk intelligence company. we are dedicated to helping organizations worldwide eliminate fake accounts and all malicious activity. leveraging ai, we identify the root of fraud with the shield device id and provide actionable risk intelligence in real time, helping all online businesses stop fraud, build trust, and drive growth. with offices in san francisco, miami, london, berlin, jakarta, bengaluru, beijing, and singapore, we are rapidly achieving our mission - eliminating unfairness to enable trust for the world. responsibilities as a machine learning engineer (risk), you will develop and leverage innovative machine learning solutions to solve complex sets of problems and applications. by analyzing and detecting patterns in vast amounts of data, you will have a good understanding of machine learning life cycle-algorithms, data structures and design patterns. we are looking for talented and passionate individuals who are proactive in identifying problems and have the logical thought process and skills to solve them. there will be many opportunities to explore new tech stacks and to work on advanced technologies. ability to design and develop machine learning algorithms discover, design, and develop analytical methods to support novel approaches of data and information processing identify and apply appropriate methods to process and analyze large data-sets of labelled and unlabeled records, and discover new valuable insights for the system provide support on other part of the system (not limited to machine learning) conduct software performance analysis, scaling, tuning and optimization review and contribute to improve current software and system architecture for stability and to optimize performance research & development of fraud detection solution requirements minimum bachelor degree in computer science, information system with machine learning specialization or equivalent strong foundation in database and data scaling experience with various machine learning algorithms and ability to apply in real life cases experience in mysql, nosql and columnar database experience in c++, c, python and other programming languages will be an advantage prior experience in e-payments or e-commerce industry is a plus strong analytical, interpersonal, communication and presentation skills

693cec88ffb1be19985cacfbe7e2d74d08a39849.job_desc: company overview lynx analytics was founded in 2010 by a group of insead students and professors with a strong research background in graph analytics. several of our founders since then became professors and faculty directors of analytics centers at leading us universities. our founding purpose? to apply graph theory to simplify and solve complex, real-world business problems. our mission has evolved over the years, and we currently offer a range of cutting edge data analytics and ai solutions to help companies transform their operations and optimise their commercial performance. back then, graph theory was mostly the purview of social networking sites. we wanted to expand this technology and help companies leverage their communities to unlock greater growth. lynx has offices in singapore, us, hong kong, hungary, and operations in several other countries such as canada, germany, indonesia. we work with some of the world's largest companies and are constantly looking to expand our knowledge base and geographical footprint. lynx analytics' technology is deployed with various clients internationally and has significant growth potential. we have a diverse and inclusive global team comprising professors, phds, msc's, and mbas from ivy leagues, insead and nus with a broad spectrum of experience in start-ups and blue-chip companies (google, databricks, zs, abbvie, amgen, vodafone, morgan stanley, palantir, katana graph to name but a few). it is the combination of our industry insight and experience, scalable proprietary technology, and highly qualified people that drives our compelling value proposition. we are looking for ambitious, innovative, empathetic and relentless team players to explore the career opportunities that we offer as we continue to scale our operations. as our senior data engineer, you will work on automating and productizing advanced big data transformation and analytics pipelines. you would be working with standard big data technologies (hadoop, spark, etc) as well as our proprietary big graph analysis framework. key responsibilities a senior data engineer's responsibility is to implement and deploy data analysis pipelines at various clients of lynx analytics. this includes participating in and supervising the activities below: understand deeply the business problem that we are trying to solve by our analytical solution through continuous consultations with employees of our client, discover the client's existing data sources that are relevant to the problem we try to solve. this includes discussions with client it, data owners, future business users, etc. working together with the it teams of the client, define the technical architecture for the analytical solution that we are to deploy for the client. implement the data ingestion subsystem: this is the system responsible for moving all the necessary data sources to a single location where the actual analysis will happen. implement the data analysis pipelines. integrate the results into business uis developed by lynx or pre-existing client software systems requirements relevant tertiary qualification, preferably at masters level or above, in engineering or another relevant discipline with strong academic results strong programming skills solid knowledge of python and java (or better yet, scala) good understanding of the linux os including basic sysadmin and shell scripting abilities sql experience in project delivery in a b2b setting good problem-solving skills fluency in english willingness to travel desirable experience in big data a minimum of 6 years of experience in data science or analytics industry experience in working for a big enterprise (like our clients) what we offer opportunity to work on creating innovative, leading-edge data science pipelines using our state of the art, in-house built big graph tool work closely with the developers of the (big graph) tool you will be building upon be a member of a very strong team with mathematicians, ex-googlers, ivy league professors, mba alumni and telecommunications industry experts startup atmosphere competitive salary equity incentives for employees opportunity to travel (southeast asia, us, and europe) flexible working hours, family-friendly workplace

d0b875ae89a1fdec970800bb844114c9f00b83e9.job_desc: responsibilities dso national laboratories (dso) is singapore's largest defence research and development (r&d) organisation, with the critical mission to develop technological solutions to sharpen the cutting edge of singapore's national security. at dso, you will develop more than just a career. this is where you will make a real impact and shape the future of defence across the spectrum of air, land, sea, space and cyberspace. the electronic systems division advances electronic warfare systems with radio frequency and micro-electronics technologies and provides electromagnetic superiority. people are dso s greatest asset. you will get to realise your career aspirations and develop your own niche either as a deep technical expert or a leader in the team. with frequent career dialogues and a robust training and development framework, we will provide you with the necessary development tools for you to reach your potential. you will also be recognised and rewarded through competitive remuneration packages and scholarship opportunities. the candidate will conduct research and development in wireless communication network. the job will require deep expertise in wireless digital communication and networking theories and concepts, wireless communication network system design, analysis and simulation, and also development of robust wireless communication network systems that perform well in adverse electromagnetic conditions. the person will also need to keep abreast on the latest research developments in wireless communication network. communications and signal processing engineer in this role, you will: be part of a team that develops solutions to enhance wireless communications performance in adverse environment dive into applied research and development in the realm of communications, signal processing, ai/ml and optimization hands-on experimentation and development with live-data to validate your innovations requirements master s / bachelor s degree in electrical engineering / data science / machine learning / computer science / physics knowledge in developing algorithms in programming languages such as matlab/python/c/c++ background in one or more of the following fields: (1) wireless communications, (2) signal processing, (3) ai/ml and (4) mathematical optimization passion in solving open-ended problems good analytical skills to understand and resolve encountered issues with the team

executives, defend design decisions and incorporate feedback into the design cycle directly work with users to conduct user research, understand customer empathy and build design assets in the form of prototypes, concept sketches or high-fidelity mockups. you will be creating user interface designs that are intuitive, beautiful and provide tremendous value to the end users. you will be leading the ui/ux around the product design and will work in close collaboration with your awesome team members. conceptualize, design and develop data visualization solutions that synthesize data concepts into clear communications for key business stakeholders. you will have a tremendous opportunity to bring your design philosophy to the data products and make them alive. requirements 3-5 years of professional experience designing and shipping excellent products a strong portfolio that showcases your work, provides detail of your role on projects, and shows examples of functional designs and/or projects that you have contributed to from start to finish experience leading human-centered interaction design activities, e.g. research, information architecture, task flows, wireframes and understanding of latest ux patterns. a professional portfolio demonstrating both visual and interaction design experience. strong visual design background, e.g. color, composition, typography and shape. hands on experience with one or more design tools e.g sketch, invision, adobe creative suite etc. experience designing for mobile apps, web, accessibility, and analytics passionate curiosity regarding emerging trends in innovation and enthusiasm for using the design process to make businesses more effective, relevant and successful. knowledge of html, css, javascript, and modern js libraries/frameworks for creating data-intensive applications knowledge of saas/paas (cloud computing), relational databases and web technologies strong verbal and written communication skills as well as excellent presentation skills self-motivated, a good communicator, and able to balance quality deliverables with tight deadlines.

ansible, python, and javascript frameworks. apply cloud (aws) and vmware computing skills to deploy upgrades and fixes. knowledge of best practices and it operations in an always-up, always-available service. experience with or knowledge of agile software development methodologies excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills. prepare and maintain technical documentation. qualifications: bachelors or higher in computer science, engineering & it related fields or technical discipline. 2+ years experience as a devops engineer or software-engineering with strong linux skills. familiarity with container orchestration services, especially kubernetes familiarity with agile software development in ansible, python java, javascript experience in administering and deploying ci/cd tools such as git, jira, gitlab, or jenkins. well-versed in one or more scripting languages shell, python, ruby, java script etc. well-versed in ansible , python, json, xml, and yaml. knowledge in setting up testing tools such as junit, pylint, pytest, etc any devops professional certifications will be a plus.

5105fd4f16b8495b342d2f2eac67e5374ac7aab2.job_desc: the scope as we re-imagine how developers and researchers should use visual editors to build their most ambitious project yet - one thing is clear - great design and problem empathy leads the way in how we craft our platform. you will work closely with our product, development, and marketing teams to understand user needs and create design solutions that meet those needs. you will be responsible for developing wireframes, user flows, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups that effectively communicate your design vision. you will define new features and product concepts, flesh out the high-level workflow and interactions of the feature, and translate it into an actual, production-level, component in the platform. in addition, you will work closely with software engineers (both backend and frontend) to realize your design and run sanity checks on various proposed interactions - latency sanity, integration with other components, changes required to database design, etc. responsibilities key responsibilities include creating wireframes, dashboard designs, and data visualizations to communicate ideas that inspire, inform and captivate viewers illustrate design ideas using storyboards, process flows, and sitemaps stay on top of the latest standards, trends, and changes in visual and interaction design manage documentation processes around design projects craft design solutions with functional, logical, and interactive insights requirements minimum 3 years experience in ui/ux design building software products experience with mockup and prototyping tools: sketch, framer, principle, figma, invision experience with ui components: material ui, blueprint js experience designing wcag-compliant, accessible interfaces basic knowledge of html/css and design principles for web and mobile platforms in the field of ai and machine learning write documentation and usage guidelines that teach engineers how to apply components across design and code portfolio showing deep product understanding and craftspersonship, both ui and ux experience designing for ai, data processing, etl related applications is a plus why you'll love us we are a technology-first team dedicated to developing the most intuitive and performant platform to shape the way users think about building machine learning capabilities. we are a quirky group of engineers, serious about shaping the future of machine learning adoption. you will have the largest impact on how users in both present and future interact with the sheer amount of complexity join us and solve tough problems - there's so much left to build.

edf55d6b24f22ebecb772492a397120c6e0affc2.job_desc: location: singapore specialisation: information technology salary: sgd 160,000 - 200,000 (annual) reference: pr/092790 contact details: sarah chin contact email: sarah.chin@jac-recruitment.com job published: december 05, 2023 09:14 company overview an exciting opportunity is waiting for you in our client s smart manufacturing division. you will spearhead the digital transformation efforts of our client . you will be working on commercial and operational digital applications and projects that will transform our business and bring customer experience to greater heights. you will be working in squads with fellow enthusiasts, to re-imagine how we serve our connected customers. as a digital disrupter, you ll recreate and redefine our business to generate lasting competitive advantage, focusing on building the applications for our clients s existing / new digital products. job responsibilities comprehend the business requirements communicated by the business users (e.g., the operations, engineering, and commercial teams) and propose a technical architecture or solution that assists in addressing the issues outlined in their problem statements. construct iot applications for proof-of-concept and prototyping. construct ai applications, including object detection, video analytics, and additional ai/ml algorithms. collaborate with the team, which consists of an iot engineer, a full stack developer, and a data engineer, to use agile methodology to develop the iot and ai minimum viable products. this may involve developing scripts and/or prototypes from the ground up, as well as utilising reusable components. embrace the agile methodology: iterate, develop, test, and analyse the applications in consideration of their final objectives and key results. capable of mentoring and supervising other members of the team, including a data engineer and an iot specialist. engage in activities such as educating, sharing best practises, presenting at brownbag talks, and facilitating internal seminars in order to serve as an iot/ai evangelist in our tech team. job requirements experience in a related field or a bachelor's degree in a computer science or computer engineering discipline that is pertinent to the position. ten to twelve years of experience and comprehensive knowledge of iot, sensor, and machine learning development. proficient in programming and possessing a robust knowledge base in computer science, including expertise in databases, data structures, algorithms, and software development. skilled in development and programming abilities in python or other languages. proficient in designing and managing iot and ai solutions constructed on aws. having pertinent aws cloud certification would confer a distinct advantage. a bonus is practical experience and knowledge of deep learning frameworks such as pytorch and tensorflow. benefits working location: singapore apply online or feel free to contact me directly (via email: sarah.chin@jac-recruitment.com) for more information about this opportunity. due to the high volume of applicants, we regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. thank you for your understanding. #li-jacsg #countrysingapore sarah chin (r 1655546 ) jac recruitment pte ltd (ea license no: 90c3026)

eac334a5770e89fac04aec80d72a4f71848b165d.job_desc: te connectivity s r&d/product development engineering teams conceive original ideas for new products, introduce them into practice. they are responsible for product development, and qualification from market definition through production and release; assist in the qualification of suppliers for new products to ensure suppliers deliver quality parts, materials, and services for new or improved manufacturing processes; conduct feasibility studies, testing on new and modified designs; direct and support detailed design, testing, prototype fabrication and manufacturing ramp. the r&d/product development engineering teams provide all required product documentation including, but not limited to, solid model, 2d/3d production drawings, product specifications, and testing requirements. they create and modify detailed drawings and drafting or conceptual models from layouts, rough sketches or notes and contribute to design modifications to facilitate manufacturing operation or quality of product. typical fields of expertise include: materials, mechanics and systems, electrical, optics, chemistry, software, automation systems, packaging, testing and measurement, and manufacturing of electrical, mechanical and electronic components, products, and their integration into systems. tyco electronics singapore pte ltd (te connectivity) is looking for an r&d scientist/engineer to join our corporate r&d center. the scientist/engineer will be part of a newly formed artificial intelligence team to create an ai hub for te in singapore. team members will collaborate with r&d peers, business unit partners as well as local university and government research centers to undertake projects that will embed ai in te s design and process development work flows to deliver a competitive advantage to te s technologies. this position is based at our singapore hq. the singapore corporate r&d center is chartered to work with the cto s and advanced development groups of te business units to identify technical areas of interest for r&d and develop forward looking technologies that will deliver broad value to the business. in order to improve the new product development process, te is expanding our artificial intelligence capabilities as a part of our digitalization strategy to improve efficiency, decrease cost, and decrease time to market. job responsbiitilies adopt cutting-edge data science techniques (using in-house coding tools or commercial software) to solve engineering problems (such as manufacturing process development, tool design, design for manufacturing dfm etc.) lead multiple projects in developing data science solutions to support new product development in te collect and analyze experimental and simulation data from various sources, clean and transform it, and then analyze it to identify trends, patterns, and insights. use statistical and machine learning techniques to build predictive models that can be used to forecast future outcomes or make informed decisions. communicate findings to stakeholders in a clear and concise manner. this may involve creating reports, visualizations, or presentations. work in a multi-disciplinary environment with specialists in data science, electronics, material science, mechanics, additive manufacturing and other fields work with local and global te sites, and external customers and partners, to address urgent or strategic needs partner with singapore research institutes to develop advanced ai techniques, and assist with validation and knowledge transfer of outsourced projects create awareness across te of the ai modelling capabilities of the singapore center job requirements bachelor's or higher degree in mechanical and production (or related) plus 5 years experience in manufacturing process development knowledge of manufacturing processes (molding, extrusion, plating, stamping, assembly etc.) and design for manufacturing (dfm) deep understanding of data science and machine learning algorithms involving multiple data types (having a second degree on data science is a plus) keen interest in r&d involving coding and data processing strong programming skill in python, c++ or similar languages preferred: familiarity with te products, such as connectors, cables, sensors etc. broad knowledge of different materials mechanical, electric, thermal properties, including polymer, metal and alloy familiarity with project management competencies values: integrity, accountability, teamwork, innovation
