f118b6f48518de948699f6c7dde2c282f553e5c7.job_desc: overview: we are seeking a highly skilled consulting solutions engineer to join our team. the successful candidate will work with uipath's customers to understand their automation needs, drivers for digital transformation, and design and develop technical solutions using uipath's market-leading business automation platform (bap). the ideal candidate should have a broad understanding of multiple technology solutions, prior automation and solution-selling application experience in the enterprise it domain and hold enterprise architecture credentials, with a track record of designing and implementing secure solutions across on-premises and cloud-based application environments. as a consulting solutions engineer, you will be a trusted technical advisor to our most strategic enterprise customers. you will work collaboratively with our sea sales, gtm, and product development teams, employing value-based selling pre-sales motions to achieve the technical win and translate the solution into business value. this role is a critical element of the enterprise gtm organization and a catalyst in achieving territory growth goals by landing and expanding uipath's platform in the enterprise customer segment. joining us means you'll be working alongside some of the best technical talent in the region and a market leader in enterprise automation. you'll have the opportunity to be a part of real digital transformation and do some of the most impactful work in your career. what you'll do at uipath: you will lead technical engagements and achieve technical wins in sales opportunities across our enterprise customers in the assigned territory. you will conduct discovery workshops and art of the possible sessions to unpack business processes ripe with automation potential. this entails employing design-thinking, active-listening, and extensive hands-on whiteboarding & solutioning to credibly demonstrate the power of the uipath business automation platform. you will leverage our value assessment tools and frameworks to showcase the tco/roi of our solutions. while you must be able to conduct a full platform demo on your own, you will also work with our product specialists to architect and deliver targeted industry-specific automation demos and solutions for our enterprise customers post-discovery and after understanding their use cases and focus areas. you will orchestrate the successful outcomes of proof of concepts (poc) by leveraging regional and global specialist resources, but only after validating that such resource investments are necessary. we expect you to be the primary coordinator and dipstick of technical outcomes for our prioritized enterprise customers. occasionally, you will be expected to evangelize the value of uipath's technology in industry and customer events. as such, you will need to possess excellent communication and presentation skills and be comfortable doing this in front of technical and business stakeholders. you will be inquisitive and seek to sharpen your technical skills by acquiring new technical skills in adjacent technology areas such as security, application modernization, data analytics, ai, and cloud. uipath commits to unleashing your full potential in this regard as we consider our technical talent our biggest competitive advantage. you will gather requirements for application integration with our ecosystem partners and their technologies and understand the fit with uipath and the customer's existing application stack. this will involve developing workflows and projects for specific use cases by integrating with different applications and products. you will design and develop enterprise-grade technical artifacts as you consult and guide the customers from their as-is and to-be states. you will collaborate with the customer success and professional services teams to make the solution a reality for the customer by ensuring a clean and successful handover from the end of presales to the start of customer success and adoption. as the trusted technical advisor to our customers, we expect you to gather field requirements, market needs, customer product feedback, and feed this intelligently and in a prioritized manner to our product development teams. this ensures a sensing and feedback mechanism to achieve better product-market fit. what you'll bring to the team: a minimum of 8 years of relevant experience in solutions engineering & architecture or sales engineering (presales) in a sea enterprise software sales organization. bachelor's or master s degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field. experience in supporting sales pursuits in large multinational companies across the philippines. experience supporting sales pursuits in large conglomerates in the region intermediate-level knowledge and credentials in uipath's market-leading business automation platform or a related platform - but automation fundamentals are key. enterprise architecture credentials (e.g., togaf, zachman) and experience designing and implementing solutions that align with enterprise architecture frameworks. domain experience in selling software solutions to at least one of these focus industries - fsi and banking, manufacturing, telecom, govt, and retail. knowledge in at least one advanced technology area like ai/ml, data analytics and management, api and web services would be a plus. given the prevalence of cloud, we expect intermediate-level knowledge of infrastructure in advising our customers on uipath's cloud and/or on-premises solutions. excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to develop creative solutions to complex problems. strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with clients and cross-functional teams. ability to maintain and develop senior relationships with technical decision-makers that can influence client technology decisions with a uipath solution. experience in training sales and technical personnel on architectures and solutions. ability to validate proposed solutions and architectures and create appropriate technical assets and reusable solution artifacts for sales and technical team members to drive scale and replicability across the sales engineering organization. fluent english and any other local languages are advantageous. #li-af

6373ba7bfa2dc78f1db30780df5fe1c069d9aa4f.job_desc: headquartered in singapore, actxa pte ltd is a deep tech company founded in 2015 that leverages artificial intelligence to create next generation preventive healthcare solutions. we create evidence-based, personalised health insights in the domains of physical activities, sleep quality, body composition, stress and recovery, heart health and blood glucose evaluation and monitoring. to improve population health, actxa establishes worldwide partnerships and research collaborations to develop critical preventive health models to help people avert chronic diseases such as diabetes and hypertension. we are searching for our next team members to join our growing team. more information about us: https://www.actxa.com actxa is hiring for technical sales support engineer internal code: acx001 we are seeking a passionate technical sales support engineer plays a crucial role in bridging the gap between the technical aspects of a product or service and the sales team. a technical sales support engineer is essential for ensuring that sales teams can effectively communicate the technical aspects of a product or service, ultimately leading to successful sales and satisfied customers. they assist sales professionals in understanding and effectively communicating the technical features, benefits, and capabilities of a product or solution to potential clients. this position requires a strong technical background, excellent communication skills, and a deep understanding of the product or service being sold. 1. product knowledge: develop an in-depth understanding of the company's products or services, including their features, functionality, and technical specifications. stay up-to-date with product updates and changes. 2. pre-sales and post technical support: collaborate with the sales team to understand customer requirements and challenges. prepare and deliver technical presentations and solutions to potential customers. provide pre-sales technical support by answering customer queries, addressing concerns, and conducting product demonstrations. responsible for the transition from the sales phase to the implementation phase and product launch by working closely with clients and internal teams. troubleshoot technical issues or challenges that may arise during the integration process and work to find solutions. address technical post-sales inquiries and issues to ensure customer satisfaction. 3. proposal development: collaborate with the sales, product and platform teams to create technical proposals, including pricing, configurations, and technical documentation. ensure that proposals align with the customer's technical requirements. 4. technical expertise: offer technical expertise to the sales team to help them address customer objections and concerns effectively. act as a technical resource during the sales process to build credibility and trust with potential clients. provide technical training to customers and sales team members to enhance their product knowledge and sales effectiveness. 5. competitive analysis: stay informed about competitor products and services, and provide insights to the sales team regarding competitive advantages and disadvantages. 6. documentation: create, maintain and update technical documentation, user guides, product manuals, datasheets, and case studies, to aid in the sales process. 7. customer relationship building: build and maintain relationships with key customers to enhance trust and loyalty. collect feedback from the sales team regarding customer experiences and technical challenges and provide this feedback to the product development team for continuous improvement. requirements diploma or bachelor's degree in information technology, computer science, computer engineering, electrical & electronics engineering, or related discipline. at least 2 to 4 years in technical sales and support from industries like, digital health, connected devices, software/cloud services, information technology, or similar industries. keen interest in digital healthcare, ai in healthcare, preventive health and wellness, and sports science domains. excellent communication and presentation skills with good interpersonal and relationship-building skills. sales acumen and customer-oriented mindset. ability to problem-solve and can be very resourceful. a natural tenacity, resilience and determination travelling is required for this role. benefits what do we offer? fun working environment flexi benefits employee wellness program actxa pte ltd is an equal opportunity employer. employment decisions will be based on merit, qualifications and abilities. actxa pte ltd does not discriminate in employment opportunities or practices on the basis of race, colour, religion, gender, sexuality, national origin, age, disability, marital status or any other characteristics protected by law. protecting your privacy and the security of your data are longstanding top priorities for actxa pte ltd. your personal data will be processed for the purposes of managing actxa pte ltd s recruitment related activities, which include setting up and conducting interviews and tests for applicants, evaluating and assessing the results, and as is otherwise needed in the recruitment and hiring processes. please consult our privacy notice ( https://www.actxa.com/privacy-policy ) to know more about how we collect, use, and transfer the personal data of our candidates. here you can find how you can request for access, correction and/or withdrawal of your personal data.

6b64e346533c0039d237c128f1911668d28d5848.job_desc: (singapore) responsibilities work as part of a scrum team, involved in the development of new product features, enhancements and support of the bondlinc fixed income saas platform. this includes frontend, backend, databases and other middleware components. be involved in various areas of product development using cloud native cutting edge technologies in application engineering, data engineering, ai/ml to build highly scalable, resilient and secure application architectures. perform peer code review, make use of extensive automation and continuous integration / devops tools towards a smooth deployment of system changes in production. use tools like confluence, jira to create wikis, knowledgebase etc. provide clear transparency in terms of status reporting, deliverables and deadlines. requirements around 5 years of relevant work experience required in software development experience in any of the back-end programming frameworks like spring boot(java), django (python) or node.js experience in any of the web frameworks like javascript, angular, react, html/css, ajax, jquery database skills required such as mysql, mongodb, dynamodb solid coding practices including design documentation, unit testing, and peer code reviews familiar with web servers such as apache and nginx good to have working knowledge in any cloud platform like aws/google cloud / azure at least one year of experience with kubernetes, ecs, docker, and/or cloud deployment technologies understanding of cloud native serverless frameworks like aws lambda understanding of git, build servers and continuous integration deployment tools like jenkins, ansible, terraform knowledge of restful apis to integrate applications to server side systems excellent analytical skills, problem solving, critical thinking and communication skills able to work independently with a sense of responsibility compensation negotiable. to apply: send a cv and cover letter to info@bondlinc.com.

6ac54d497b2dd2e00a1df542443e6921494e9efe.job_desc: company overview xsquare is a pioneer in intelligent warehouse automation solutions. we are providing intelligent solutions for pallet movements, interoperability, and optimization, allowing warehouse operators to overcome the challenges in automation through advanced robotics and ai. as leader of one of our core hardware teams, you will be working with a team of engineers to design, specify, plan and build new models of autonomous forklifts and improve the existing range of products. job description owning and leading the architecture, specifications, roadmap and development for xsquare's autonomous forklifts preparing plans for development, setting deadlines, delegating tasks and identifying markers of success coordinating a team of engineers to complete all necessary tasks within a project undertaking practical development work as part of the team researching relevant technical requirements and ensuring that deliverables meet these requirements troubleshooting and identifying solutions to problems overseeing testing procedures delivering updates on project progress mentoring junior team members work together with other stakeholders to define new product features and directions required qualifications and knowledge minimum bachelor's degree in fields like ieee, mechatronics, or equivalent practical experience. product research and development experience for industrial automation or robotics experienced in system design and specifications team lead experience highly motivated and creative, thinking out of the box strong team mentality, interpersonal and communications skills understanding of manufacturing processes knowledge of microcontrollers, dacs and adcs, can bus, plc

63f45711f83f4f9f66cf5dd28cbb07aea9a29925.job_desc: alemhealth's award-winning ris/pacs hardware and software connects hospitals and diagnostic centres in emerging markets to a global network of radiologists and ai services. our ris/pacs solutions are cost-effective and designed specifically to meet the unique needs of radiologists and diagnostic centres in places where there are too few of both. we make it easy for facilities and radiologists to get connected seamlessly to provide patient care. we are seeking a talented and experienced ris/pacs sales executive to join our growing team. the successful candidate will be responsible for providing high-quality demos, performing consultative sales, and working closely with prospective customers to identify their workflow issues and guide them towards the most optimal solution for their facility. the ideal candidate for this position will also have experience providing demos over zoom or other virtual platforms. furthermore, we are looking for a sales executive who can effectively sell to radiologists and imaging center operators in emerging and frontier markets. the successful candidate will have an in-depth understanding of the unique requirements and challenges of these markets and will be able to tailor our solutions to meet their specific needs. responsibilities: conducting in-depth analysis of potential customers' current workflow and identifying areas where our ris/pacs solutions can help improve efficiency and productivity providing effective product demonstrations that showcase the value of our ris/pacs solutions to potential customers developing and implementing sales strategies that effectively communicate the benefits of our solutions to potential customers collaborating with internal teams, including product development and marketing, to ensure that our solutions and sales collateral meet the needs of the market building and maintaining relationships with key decision-makers at prospective customer organizations managing the sales process from start to finish, including negotiating contracts and closing deals staying up-to-date on industry trends and best practices in order to continually improve our sales strategies qualifications: strong knowledge of ris/pacs solutions and related technologies proven track record of success in sales, particularly in the diagnostic imaging industry exceptional presentation and communication skills ability to build strong relationships with potential customers excellent problem-solving and analytical skills experience with consultative sales and a customer-centric approach ability to work independently as well as part of a team, and not afraid to pick up the phone nice to have: bachelor's degree in a relevant field or experience as a radiographer, field service engineer or similar. we offer a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as opportunities for career growth and development. if you are a motivated and results-driven sales professional with a passion for helping customers improve their workflows, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

1ac2eaf3413fd027666ef584a0f32be0938cc34b.job_desc: job description java developer remote software engineering software engineer agile practices, backend, native mobile development, cloud computing table of contents about slash role and responsibilities, and how will the role impact slash? how do you know if you are a good fit? why join us? about slash slash is a build studio. we build remote, autonomous teams to help innovators develop software, products, and hi-tech startups. we also build and invest in our own startups and commercialize them through joint ventures in asean and europe. slash has headquarters in singapore and community-oriented r&d hubs in phnom penh, yerevan, bali, jakarta & bandung, and yogjakarta. role and responsibilities, and how will the role impact slash? slash is looking for a dynamic java developer to build fast backends or powerful, readable clean code, measurable, and testable for sophisticated enterprise-grade systems and fast-growing funded startups. driving frontend and backend development stacks best case practices, processes and standards throughout the company. supporting solution architects, scrum masters, and development teams with delivering enterprise-grade backend systems to clients. we will rely on your technical leadership and ingenuity to stay up to date on the latest in frontend and backend development stacks, system integration, security, apis, middlewares, cloud, devops (serverless and ci/cd). how do you know if you are a good fit? positive attitude, independence, inner drive to become successful good verbal and written communication skills in english. ability to talk to international clients tech-savvy (up to date with latest trends) proactive, confident, doesn t shy away from responsibility, take full ownership exceptional analytical, debugging/ troubleshooting, coding skills, problem-solving interest to work on multiple global corporate and startup projects, across different industries in an agency. minimum 3 years of professional work experience as java developer proficient with java spring framework, good to have experience in kotlin and typescript, basic knowledge of typescript, sql knowledge of event-driven concepts is a plus ability to coordinate and communicate with diverse teams and individuals (e.g solution architects, product managers, scrum masters, developers, customer service, clients) advanced knowledge of tdd, automated testing frameworks, sql, restful and graphql is a plus the ability to understand different business models and applications is a bonus keen interest in learning about other technologies (such as, nextjs, rabbitmq, expressjs, mongodb, serverless, machine learning, blockchain, etc) have knowledge of drawing system architecture, a sequence flow diagram proficient with broad software development and agile concepts is a bonus! experience with working with clients is a plus experience with working in a product or software agency is a plus have a university degree. why join us? at slash, we re proud of our collaborative culture; everyone is ready to lend a helping hand, whether it s your first day on the job or your thousandth. we also embrace a trust-centric culture, flexibility and accountability first, and a work-life integration mindset. check out our culture here and meet our legendary team! projects/clients: get the stability of a larger group and the excitement of a startup. work on interesting global projects, challenges and technologies for top brands, fast-paced startups and governments. experience working with a mature scrum team and day-to-day agile mindset project implementation. check out our success story! team and working environment: join our diverse remote builders community and hubs oriented in jakarta, bandung, yogyakarta, bali, yerevan, and phnom penh. experience an optimised remote working environment. benefit from the flexible remote work package options (work from home or work from a coworking space). learning: we focus on the growth of both parties. you will meet communities packed with intelligent peers and attend events with regular speakers, so you don t miss out on the latest tech trends. slash is a safe space for people to share if you re passionate about something. our favourite learning practices are the growth accountability group, mentoring program, venture club, and leadership. on top of your remuneration, you will get annual training or learning credits to be redeemed. we actively encourage everyone to suggest training beneficial for their professional growth. technology: we work on a wide-range of technologies: latest web and mobile technologies, ai, blockchain, latest cloud services, microservices & middlewares, security & infrastructure, etc.

2f31d23dd52aa3357eddc93e75084f00aedb90b9.job_desc: job description: r&d engineer (software) responsibilities: design and develop system architecture and software for water analysis nstruments. understand requirement specification documents and develop software functional blocks software documentation work as a team to integrate the software with hardware team bootloader development. requirements: degree in engineering 3-5 years experience in embedded sw development with strong knowledge in c, assembly experience in driver development strong knowledge in 16bit/32bit microcontroller/microprocessor architecture microprocessor or microcontroller interfacing to analog and digital circuits development experience in communication protocols, like. rs232, rs485, spi, i2c, usb &ethernet excellent teamwork and good communication skills. knowledge in gui development tools, embedded os is an added advantage. all successful candidates can expect a very competitive remuneration package and a comprehensive range of benefits. please email your resume in a detailed ms word format to joyce@peopleprofilers.com stating 1) current drawn 2) expecting salary 3) date available 4) reason to leave each job: we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified joyce koh ai leng people profilers pte ltd 20 cecil st, #08-09, plus building, singapore 049705 tel: 6950 9737 www.peopleprofilers.com ea license number: 02c4944 ea personnel reg nos r1110618 job id : required skills: resume analysis r salary architecture ltd ms word reason programming c teamwork documentation email software engineering communication

519a02db6825d366c701e0739aff21e7ae6e0d58.job_desc: the ntu education strategy 2025 is leveraging learning analytics to improve teaching and learning. this position is similar in nature to a business analyst but for advancing the use of data for teaching and learning purposes. the position is critical for communicating with faculty and students to get their buy-in on the learning analytics goals of the university. the candidate would also be responsible for gathering faculty, students and schools' teaching and learning needs, and translating the needs into meaningful learning analytics solutions. finally, the candidate will be responsible for enhancing the data literacy of faculty and students. key responsibilities: conceptualise the communication plan for learning analytics with various units in the university seek opportunities to collaborate with internal and external parties to achieve the learning analytics goals engage students and support faculty champions to increase acceptance and adoption of learning analytics, communicate with these end-users and analyse their business needs, conduct risk assessment to mitigate likelihood of major backlash due to use of student learning data manage learning analytics pilots with the data scientists and data engineers, develop and continuously enhance dashboards and other visualisation tools for intended users, conduct data literacy training and consultancy with data scientists, explore new ways of using analytics to improve teaching and learning. requirements: bachelor or master degree in business analytics, data science and related fields. at least five years of experience as a business analyst or experiences working on data related project in a university setting. experienced in developing dashboards and other visualization tools such as qliksense and power bi. some technical knowledge relating to ai/ml would be ideal. strong listening, persuasive communication, and networking skills. strong ability in translating user needs into a data science problem. strong understanding of data science or analytics and governance. familiarity of various data governance framework issued by pdpa would be ideal. team player, strong ability and willingness to support other work areas of the department when needed. hiring institution: ntu

14bfb4ea21148c1741036bb7b8cc57e8ce92bdca.job_desc: we are seeking a highly motivated and experienced product manager to lead supply chain products. the ideal candidate will have a strong background in supply chain and product management, with experience in developing and launching new products and features. they will also have excellent communication and leadership skills, and be able to work effectively with cross-functional teams to drive results. this role offers significant opportunities to deliver a large impact on strategic priorities for meta; including building out the ai infrastructure network and playing a critical role in reality labs devices supply chain, helping bring the next generation of computing platforms to customers. product manager, enterprise responsibilities: is the primary driver for identifying significant opportunities, and driving product vision, strategies and roadmaps in the context of broader organizational strategies and goals. understand meta s strategic and competitive position and deliver products that are aligned with our mission and recognized best in the industry. maximize efficiency in a constantly evolving environment where the process is fluid and creative solutions are the norm. incorporate data, research, and market analysis to inform product strategies and roadmaps. plan, initiate, and manage information technology projects for web-based products and platforms. lead the ideation, technical development, and launch of innovative tools, platforms, and/or products. drive product development with teams of world-class engineers and designers, while maintaining team health. work closely with cross-functional teams to drive product vision, define product requirements, coordinate resources from other groups (design, legal, etc.), and guide the team through key milestones. integrate usability studies, research, and market analysis into product requirements to improve engineer productivity and enhance user satisfaction. define and analyze metrics that inform the success of products. identify and track key performance metrics. minimum qualifications: 8+ years product management or related industry experience. 5+ years of experience working on a supply chain product or in a supply chain operations function. requires a bachelor's degree (or foreign degree equivalent) in supply chain, computer science, engineering, information systems, analytics, mathematics, physics, applied sciences, or a related field. experience defining vision and strategy for a product. experience going through a full product lifecycle, integrating customer feedback into product requirements, driving prioritization and pre/post-launch execution. experience working in a technical environment with a broad, cross functional team to drive product vision, define product requirements, coordinate resources from other groups (design, legal, etc.), and guide the team through key milestones. experience analyzing complex, large-scale data sets and making decisions based on data. requirements gathering across diverse areas and users, and converting and developing them into a product solution. strong leadership, organizational and execution skills. ability to influence and drive alignment with senior leadership and business stakeholders. proven ability to communicate clearly, accurately, and persuasively using data. preferred qualifications: experience working on b2b or products with internal users. experience using or deploying prominent industry standard supply chain software. experience leading build/buy decisions and leveraging bought 3p tools as part of the product suite. about meta: meta builds technologies that help people connect, find communities, and grow businesses. when facebook launched in 2004, it changed the way people connect. apps like messenger, instagram and whatsapp further empowered billions around the world. now, meta is moving beyond 2d screens toward immersive experiences like augmented and virtual reality to help build the next evolution in social technology. people who choose to build their careers by building with us at meta help shape a future that will take us beyond what digital connection makes possible today beyond the constraints of screens, the limits of distance, and even the rules of physics.

47a61e83120dec204333d23f8ee68951fd94b112.job_desc: job : ventures primary location : asia-singapore-singapore schedule : full-time employee status : permanent posting date : 26/dec/2023, 2:14:52 am unposting date : 09/jan/2024, 5:59:00 pm about sc ventures sc ventures ( scv ) was established in 2018 with the purpose of rewiring the dna in banking by bringing three distinct areas together: the exellerator lab, enabling innovation at large in the bank by supporting intrapreneurs and their ideas, collaborating with fintech s through the scv fintech bridge and engaging with clients and 42af578def37cb40778e4f8faf4cded74c6bc463.job_desc: about bytedance founded in 2012, bytedance's mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. with a suite of more than a dozen products, including tiktok, helo, and resso, as well as platforms specific to the china market, including toutiao, douyin, and xigua, bytedance has made it easier and more fun for people to connect with, consume, and create content. why join us creation is the core of bytedance's purpose. our products are built to help imaginations thrive. this is doubly true of the teams that make our innovations possible. together, we inspire creativity and enrich life - a mission we aim towards achieving every day. to us, every challenge, no matter how ambiguous, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. status quo? never. courage? always. at bytedance, we create together and grow together. that's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the users we serve. join us. about the team as a core member of our llm global data team, you'll be at the heart of our operations. gain first-hand experience in understanding the intricacies of training large language models (llms) with diverse data sets. through our carefully designed rotation program, you'll witness how high-quality data is meticulously crafted and used. after completing your rotation, you will have the chance to select your area of expertise. this will be your stepping stone to lead, train, or oversee larger data operation teams. your role will involve: 1. gaining direct experience in data production, including drafting, revising, and quality-checking, to understand the synergy between humans and data in llm training. 2. developing specialized skills in one of our data formats and content verticals. 3. collaborating with product managers and engineers to assess and enhance the effectiveness of our operational processes, including conducting improvement experiments. 4. working closely with the leadership of tech and product teams to understand the impact of data in aigc products and llm training. 5. leading task forces or projects in an operational domain following successful incubation. qualifications: 1. experience in journalism, teaching, writing, text editing is highly valued. experience as annotators for leading ai/llm companies is strongly preferred. 2. candidates should be intelligent, diligent, and skilled in analyzing cases and structuring operational improvements. 3. comfort with meeting deadlines and generating creative solutions, including the use of technology and tools, to enhance the quality of both individual and team outputs. 4. a deep interest in llms, human behavior and user experience is essential. the ideal candidate is an enthusiastic learner who finds engagement with diverse case studies and annotators stimulating. bytedance is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. at bytedance, our mission is to inspire creativity and enrich life. to achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. we are passionate about this and hope you are too.

value proposition for aveva s solutions. skills to identify market trends and opportunities for nominated territory, refining lead development plans to take advantage of such opportunities. confident vietnamese, etc.) bachelor s degree or professional sales/inside sales/sdr-related experience. about aveva aveva is a global leader in industrial software, sparking ingenuity to drive responsible use of the world s resources. the company s secure industrial cloud platform and applications enable businesses to harness the power of their information and improve collaboration with customers, with us and contribute to the exciting evolution of video analytics. apply now to be part of a team where your skills will be valued, your ideas will be heard, and your career will flourish in the fast-paced world of ai and data science! application instructions please apply for this position by submitting your text cv using internsg. kindly note that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

1ec18f305421c7bc6d4276f4d72edab25b39744b.job_desc: ant group traces its roots back to alipay, which was established in 2004. today, we are a world-leading internet open platform. through technological innovation, we support our partners to enable inclusive, convenient digital life and digital financial services for consumers and smes (small and micro-sized enterprises). we offer a wide range of digital financial services, including digital payments and digital banking. we are looking for self-motivated ai engineers to join ant's international business group. with high standards we comply on data security and privacy protection, our ai team is leveraging privacy-preserving compuation technologies such as federated learning in an increasing range of business scenarios. we aim to establish a shared, collaborative, and mutually beneficial ecosystem with regulatory bodies and institutions from various countries as we continue to unleash the value of data by ai. responsibilities: design, develop, and maintain an innovative federated learning framework develop protocols and communication mechanisms for secure data aggregation and model updates from distributed devices research and implement state-of-the-art federated learning algorithms, ensuring that they are suitable for various machine learning tasks and maintain data privacy optimize algorithms for performance, convergence speed, and resource utilization, while considering the challenges posed by decentralized data sources implement data preprocessing, model initialization, and aggregation mechanisms that ensure effective training across a heterogeneous set of devices design and execute comprehensive testing strategies to verify the reliability, robustness, and accuracy of the federated learning framework create clear and comprehensive documentation, including technical specifications, design documents, and usage guides collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams including machine learning researchers, software developers, and product managers to align on project goals and requirements requirements: master's in computer science, electrical engineering, or a related field phd is a nice to have possess 5+ years of experience in federated learning or distributed machine learning strong programming skills in python experience with machine learning frameworks (tensorflow, pytorch, scikit-learn) familiar with software configuration management tools such as git or gitlab. knowledge of continuous integration/delivery/deployment strong understanding of federated learning principles and algorithms strong communication skills proficiency in english and mandarin in order to communicate with our mandarin-speaking stakeholders

48241d4f83439b789c9ffbc56e8948aae93a6911.job_desc: who we re looking for we are looking for an experienced software engineer, with a strong background in .net development to work with our development teams to deliver high-quality software, quickly and reliably, that has a tangible impact on our business. this role will report into the delivery lead, responsible for regional operations & investment service and low code. you must be a versatile hands-on engineer who is business-outcome driven. you are analytical and an excellent problem solver who can design and guide the delivery team in implementation whilst instilling best practices, promoting design patterns and improving devops to contribute positively to our engineering culture in apac. you are a forward thinker, attuned to the technological trends of ai, block chain and low code in the asset management industry, able to think strategically to harness the knowledge and connect the disparate tooling of new and legacies. you will lead the simplification of our application estate, moving away from the legacies and focus on leveraging more of strategic inhouse solution and low code platforms. you will have opportunities in near future to delve into blockchain and ai as we set to transform the operations landscape in the organization. you are collaborative and able to work collaboratively across global teams. about schroders we re a global investment manager managing over 700 billion of clients assets. we help institutions, intermediaries and individuals around the world invest money to meet their goals, fulfil their ambitions, and prepare for the future. we have around 5500 people on six continents. and we ve been around for over 200 years but keep adapting as society and technology changes. what doesn t change is our commitment to helping our clients, and society, prosper. we take immense pride in our culture and our reputation of being an employer of choice. it s important to us that our people feel valued, included, and supported in their professional and personal growth. by promoting flexible working, championing inclusion, and making health and wellbeing a priority, we have created the conditions for our people to thrive. the base the role will be based in singapore, our apac regional hub and will be part of the apac operations & investment services technology delivery team. it is an exciting time to join the apac technology delivery team as schroders operations look to transform itself to harness more of future technology in next few years leveraging more on low code, block chain and ai to create efficiencies and better innovative solutions to meet complex business needs in a tightly competitive market where speed is of essence. we are simplifying our application estate, modernizing our technology stack and embarking on a new operation data platform using snowflake as the strategic tooling. we are looking at potential business uses where we can embed ai into the existing/new process as we move away from legacy. what you'll do working on day-to-day software development developing solutions with a cloud-first approach. working closely with the engineering lead to implement the operations technology roadmap. collaborating with the delivery lead to prioritize backlog and ensure technical debts are tracked, logged, and mitigated in a timely manner. leading all aspects of software delivery, including design, development, testing, and implementation. ensuring agile team collaboration to continuously improve how applications are developed for easy maintenance and extensibility. supporting agile teams by providing technical guidance, conducting code reviews, ensuring adherence to software standards and policies, and mentoring junior developers where needed. contributing to agile planning and ceremonies, including story refinement, system demos, and retrospective contributing to the enterprise engineering community by discussing technology trends, innovative ideas, and sharing solutions to common issues. performing the role of scrum master for the agile team if required. provide 3rd line production support and where required across london time zone for global applications. the knowledge, experience, and qualifications you'll need minimum 5 years of software development experience using c#/.net experience with javascript programming language and at least one modern javascript ui framework, such as react, angular, used to develop single-page applications experience developing cloud-native applications on platforms like azure, aws. experience implementing design patterns using microservices or other similar technologies experience working on low code platform such as xceptor, outsystem or equivalent. experience working on either sql, nosql, or other database technologies experience in designing and developing restful apis using frameworks such as asp.net web api or asp.net core. experience working in a modern software engineering environment using agile and devops methodologies and tools, including scrum, git, and ci/cd. the knowledge, experience and qualifications that will help development experience using azure solutions familiar with agile delivery methodologies experience working on python, ssis, power bi skills able to engage with stakeholders in both business and technology multi-disciplined and able to provide support throughout sdlc knowledge of test automation techniques, such as tdd and bdd capable of balancing timely delivery against strategic development detailed and logical approach with full traceability of analysis pro-active and delivery-focused. we recognise potential, whoever you are our purpose is to provide excellent investment performance to clients through active management. diversity of thought facilitated by an inclusive culture will allow us to make better decisions and better achieve our purpose. this is why inclusion and diversity are a strategic priority for us and why we are an equal opportunities employer: you are welcome here regardless of your age, disability, gender identity, religious beliefs, sexual orientation, socio-economic background or any other protected characteristics salary expectations of candidates will be considered when assessing suitable candidates. due to the high volume of applicants, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. job reference: sin02009 .

8e3ee14b654d3aa091f9878771af7e1a8fd7704c.job_desc: job description senior devops engineer remote, phnom penh leadership roles software engineer web frontend, agile practices, backend, cloud computing, qa & testing team management, ability to motivate, innovation, systems thinking, integrity, goal achievement, growing others table of contents about slash slash is a hi-tech startup studio with a mission to build tech products that change the world. our clients are global. in addition, we build and invest our own startups and commercialize them through joint ventures in asean and europe. we work on a wide-range of technologies: web, mobile, ai, blockchain, cloud, microservices & middlewares, security & infrastructure, etc. slash has headquarters in singapore and community-oriented r&d hubs in phnom penh, yerevan, bali, yogyakarta, jakarta and bandung. we are a team of 50+ entrepreneurs, engineers, hackers, and full-stack developers with unique capabilities in web, mobile, ai, and blockchain. role and responsibilities, and how will the role impact slash? slash is looking for a dynamic senior devops to help us stay at the cutting-edge of software development. if you re into dockers, ci/cd pipelines, serverless & gitops, security, automating and securing cloud infrastructure on aws and google cloud, this is for you. you will be a thought leader in the company: why join us? about slash slash is a hi-tech startup studio with a mission to build tech products that change the world. our clients are global. in addition, we build and invest our own startups and commercialize them through joint ventures in asean and europe. we work on a wide-range of technologies: web, mobile, ai, blockchain, cloud, microservices & middlewares, security & infrastructure, etc. slash has headquarters in singapore and community-oriented r&d hubs in phnom penh, yerevan, bali, yogyakarta, jakarta and bandung. we are a team of 50+ entrepreneurs, engineers, hackers, and full-stack developers with unique capabilities in web, mobile, ai, and blockchain. role and responsibilities, and how will the role impact slash? slash is looking for a dynamic senior devops to help us stay at the cutting-edge of software development. if you re into dockers, ci/cd pipelines, serverless & gitops, security, automating and securing cloud infrastructure on aws and google cloud, this is for you. you will be a thought leader in the company: driving devops processes and standards throughout the company. supporting solution architects, scrum masters, and development teams with delivering their products to clients. we will rely on your technical leadership and ingenuity to stay up to date on the latest in devops & gitops! you will be given a lot of responsibility and freedom to make changes, come up with new ideas and implement them in consultation with our teams and clients. how do you know if you are a good fit? positive attitude, independent, inner drive to become successful good verbal and written communication skills in english. ability to talk to international clients 4+ years minimum professional work experience as a devops. proficient with software development and agile concepts full stack software development experience is a bonus!. proficiency with git and git workflows professional experience with aws cloud including preferrably, and containerisation: docker ci/cd professional experience with vpc/nat, route53, waf, secure architecture on aws and setup auto scaling, aws compliance and logging and monitoring have experience in planning, setting up and executing infrastructure as code good to have: iac: terraform or cloudformation, java spring boot experience, serverless architecture / aws lambda keen interest in automation, orchestration, infrastructure, & aws. generally very tech savvy (up to date with latest trends) have experience with kubernetes or other container orchestration (e.g. aws ecs) cluster administration and securing resources: administration, instance/tasks or pods/replicaset management, deployment, environment variables and secret management, service, networking on ingress and egress have experience in strategizing with options, pros and cons for new technologies required for the project have experience in setting up ci/cd pipeline from installing dependency, running tests, build, quality scanning and deployment and experience in using gitlab ci/cd is preferred. proactive, confident, doesn t shy away from responsibility, and take full ownership ability to coordinate and communicate with diverse teams and individuals (e.g solution architects, scrum masters, developers, and clients) have a university degree of computer science and engineering and/or other equivalent degree why join us? at slash, we re proud of our collaborative culture; everyone is ready to lend a helping hand, whether it s your first day on the job or your thousandth. we also embrace a trust-centric culture, flexibility and accountability first, and a work-life integration mindset. check out our culture here and meet our legendary team! projects/clients: get the stability of a larger group and the excitement of a startup. work on interesting global projects, challenges and technologies for top brands, fast-paced startups and governments. experience working with a mature scrum team and day-to-day agile mindset project implementation. check out our success story! team and working environment: join our diverse remote builders community and hubs oriented in jakarta, bandung, yogyakarta, bali, yerevan, and phnom penh. experience an optimised remote working environment. benefit from the flexible remote work package options (work from home or work from a coworking space). learning: we focus on the growth of both parties. you will meet communities packed with intelligent peers and attend events with regular speakers, so you don t miss out on the latest tech trends. slash is a safe space for people to share if you re passionate about something. our favourite learning practices are the growth accountability group, mentoring program, venture club, and leadership. on top of your remuneration, you will get annual training or learning credits to be redeemed. we actively encourage everyone to suggest training beneficial for their professional growth. technology: we work on a wide-range of technologies: latest web and mobile technologies, ai, blockchain, latest cloud services, microservices & middlewares, security & infrastructure, etc.

7cf65b2d80a9c71ad26512d2a8a6ee63bd58d8b4.job_desc: at nice, we don t limit our challenges. we challenge our limits. constantly. we re relentless. we re ambitious. and we make an impact. our nicers bring their a game and spend each day turning it into an a+. and if you re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you. nice is the market leader in cxi: customer experience interactions, and focuses on creating smart, connected, self-service and human assisted interactions, along the entire customer journey. we are looking for an experienced digital solution engineer to excite potential customers about our digital portfolio and ultimate help them deliver connected digital experiences to their end-customers. a successful digital solution engineer will work consultatively with prospects to identify their goals and business drivers, and creatively design a solution that will meet the ever-growing demands of their contact center needs. this position will provide dedicated sales support to sales teams in the asia pacific region by exceeding expectations in the following: proactively identifying and addressing our customer's technical needs and objections to drive new sales, and existing account expansion providing digital interaction domain expertise to help organisations innovate in their digital delivery of customer and employee experiences. actively learning and mastering the nice digital portfolio at an advanced level, to creatively apply our technology and help our customers achieve their business goals. critically evaluating the technical sustainability of each new sales opportunity or request for proposal, ensuring that our contractual obligations to each new customer are accurate, and can be delivered in a timely manner. assisting our sales team through preparation and delivery of business discussions, technical presentations, and product demonstrations, by carefully mapping customer business requirements to effective value driven technical solutions leveraging the nice digital portfolio. proactively identifying customer needs through a technical benefits assessment, carefully building the business value of the solution, in order to assist with overcoming potential objections to proposed technical solutions. meeting with our prospective customers as a trusted technical advisor, developing a deep understanding of their current environment, key business challenges and goals, and helping prospective customers envision the benefits that can be realized through an advanced contact center deployment with nice. gathering valuable field data and product feedback from each customer engagement and working directly with product management to facilitate ideas for the long-term technical direction and development of nice s software portfolio. providing an open and continuous knowledge transfer to the overall sales team and newly hired ses, highlighting the technical aspects and benefits of our solution, and how to competitively position each product. delivering partner enablement activities, ranging from ad-hoc updates to extended knowledge transfer sessions. building and maintaining demo environments both for internal nice usage and for our partners. assisting in the preparation and response to customer rfp requests, carefully qualifying the prospective deal for technical feasibility. scoping and building proofs of concept for prospective customers that require a hands-on experience of nice products, to confirm the required performance of the solution within their environment. developing detailed solution design documentation for each new customer, which will serve as the foundation of our technical engagement, and act as a bridge to seamlessly engage our professional services organization, to provide the most effective onboarding experience. continuously building and maintaining relationships with key stakeholders in each sales cycle, including executive, financial, technical decision makers and influencers within each of our prospects. be an outstanding change leader: highly collaborative, persuasive communicator with strong executive presence; works well in highly matrixed, international environment; resilient this job description is not intended to be exhaustive, and employees will also perform other reasonable related business duties as assigned by immediate supervisor and other management as required. this organization reserves the right to revise or change job duties as the need arises. this job description does not constitute a written or implied contract of employment. education requirement: bachelor s degree in business information systems, computer science, communications or related field or equivalent work experience required. experience requirement: 5+ years of experience in the digital experience and/or customer experience domains broad experience working with digital messaging and social media platforms broad experience with knowledge management, both internal & external facing broad understanding of web front-end technologies, including editing html & css and basic javascript. demonstrated track record of architecting successful digital customer experience solutions across web, social & mobile. excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to effectively listen to quickly assess the situation and then convey thoughts and ideas in a clear and concise manner. strong presentation skills must possess the ability to sell and effectively build credibility in front of all levels of management, including an executive audience. analytical and quantitative abilities required must be able to interpret and explain financial and statistical information. experience preferred: 2+ years of sales experience outside of sales engineering in a software environment ability to manage multiple competing priorities and work effectively under the pressure of time constraints in a fast-paced, 12c5b374d79460b79cfe7b6fe9c81f690b637697.job_desc: line of service assurance industry/sector fs x-sector specialism risk management level intern/trainee job description & summary we at pwc believe that challenges are better solved together. that's why you'll join a diverse, global community that comes together to build trust in society and solve important problems. with us, you are encouraged to lead with your heart and values, and where your skills are developed and put to work in exciting ways, superpowered by technology. how will you value-add: we aspire to build a team of data professionals with the ability to apply their knowledge in helping our clients solve their business challenges while future proofing their business. our practice is integrated across different pwc lines of services, and works collaboratively with our clients to manage engagements and lead teams of data and analytics resources in various aspects digital, data and analytics solutions. we are looking for candidates to join us in this ntu work degree study programme (wdsp) internship from 11 dec 2023 - 9 aug 2024 (35 weeks) or 11 dec 2023 31 may 2024 (25 weeks). about the project if the lifeblood of the digital economy is data, its heart is digital trust the level of confidence in people, processes, and technology to build a secure digital world. companies, regulators, and consumers need fresh mechanisms to build confidence as they address emerging challenges in business, risk management, and compliance. in this 25-35 week internship, be prepared to dive deeper into the financial, supply chain and government sectors and journey through their digital transformation and adoption of new platforms. choose your track: there are multiple tracks within our team where you can find your niche. candidates will be assigned to the relevant roles, listed below, based on their experience and expertise. please refer to the list below for a detailed description of the roles. track a: data engineering a data engineer is responsible for collecting, managing, and transforming raw data into information that can be consumed and interpreted downstream by end users, facilitated by data scientists and business analysts. your ultimate goal is to enable organizations to utilize their data for performance evaluation and optimization. here are some of the skills and experience you may need to be effective in your role: master s or bachelor s degree and above in analytics, information systems management, computer science or related fields keen interest in working with rdbms such as db2, oracle, microsoft sql server, postgressql, teradata, etc. possess good knowledge and experience in data quality definition, data cleansing and data treatment/profiling processes using open-source or industry-standard tools like informatica good knowledge of the following is a plus data warehouse and data management implementation methodology conceptual knowledge of the data management frameworks, including operating model, data governance, data management, data security, data quality and data architecture big data platforms like cloudera and hortonworks cloud
