helping our customers and partners better protect their organizations from cyberattacks. our products and incident response services are used within most large enterprises, governments and militaries for incident response and threat hunting. our sales professionals, sales engineers and professional services consultants design and deliver solutions for potential and existing customers to enable better visibility, insight and action to prevent and defend against attacks. netwitness provides the unique ability to provide one single platform with a unified view across all attack surfaces including network, logs/siem, endpoint and iot combined with our ai-based user and entity behavioral analysis (ueba) and security, orchestration, automation & response (soar) capabilities. looking for an ambitious, relationship focused, and results driven channel manager with expert experience selling company products and services through resellers/channels. the channels manager is an important role, and the ideal candidate will have a track record of delivering new business growth sourced through channels partners while continuously scaling the caliber and excellence of the netwitness partnership ecosystem. this person will be a dynamic leader who has experience in playing a leading role with both strategic partnerships and sales executives. netwitness is looking for a person who can grow with the company as we continue to expand. job scope: responsible for identifying and developing partnerships with distributors, system integrators and resellers across southeast asia and greater china. aligning cross functional sales-oriented activities, including marketing (field and digital), internal channel structure, sales, partner forums, cxo events, and coordination of partner enablement drive territory strategy through joint business plans, partner marketing, enablement plans, cadence, quarterly review meetings with focus partners. identification of new opportunities collaborating with end user sales reps & partners to qualify, develop and close opportunities within the assigned territory. maintaining & implementing process, criteria, and controls for selection, management, and performance of alliance & channel partners including regular reviews of contractual obligations with partners and compliance with netwitness policies, procedures, and ethical standards defining quarterly goal achievement plans with partners and identifying new business opportunities promoting the development of new gtm opportunities with each partner working with netwitness sales teams to leverage external partners in driving strategic customer outcomes oversee continuous improvement and action plans with the partners oversee and participate in distributors & channel partners qbr s maintain an accurate pipeline of all opportunities within crm achieve and exceed quota requirements: minimum 8-10 years of relevant strategic partner/channels/sales/business development experience. experience working with system integrators and resellers across southeast asia and greater china. proven success in recruiting, developing and managing strategic partnerships. background in software, saas and implementations/migration services experience in cybersecurity is a plus ability to create and cultivate relationships with strategic decision makers strong executive presence including communication and presentation skills and a high degree of comfort with large and small audiences self-motivated, resourceful, creative, adaptable, unquestionable ethics and integrity and a readiness to take calculated risk inclusive and collaborative - driving teamwork and cross-team alignment bachelor's degree required we offer: market-competitive salary health and wellness benefits flexible working hours favorable working atmosphere in a rapidly expanding company personal and professional development permanent, full-time employment rsa is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and applicants for employment and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, and any other category protected by applicable country law. if you need a reasonable accommodation during the application process, please contact the rsa talent acquisition team at [email protected] . rsa and its approved consultants will never ask you for a fee to process or consider your application for a career with rsa. rsa reserves the right to amend or withdraw any job posting at any time, including prior to the advertised closing date. updated on 7 feb 2023

8b3f34c0d4705a32ac64c8222204c1faf261d068.job_desc: job location singapore job description overview of role p&g has established singapore s the largest private research facility in the heart of biopolis, singapore s life sciences hub. in this role, you will specialize in image and multi-omics analysis. you will also be responsible for developing and implementing cutting-edge ai models and tools to analyze and integrate diverse biological data, including but not limited to images, genomics, transcriptomics, proteomics, and metabolomics data. if this sounds exciting to you, read on! your team located at the p&g singapore innovation center, you will be part of the global bioscience organization. you will have the opportunity to work in global & regional multi-functional teams and engage with both internal and external partners. how success looks like innovation and problem solving: successfully applying computational techniques to address complex biological questions or challenges to reveal business applicable insights. algorithms and models for real-world application: develop & integrate algorithms, models, and methodologies that solve complex ai problems or improve the performance of existing ai systems is a crucial success criterion. successfully translate the models into practical applications that can be scaled and used in real-world scenarios. data integration and management:. develop data etl pipelines and tools that help to automate data integration/management, visualize complex data, or provide a platform for data sharing. collaborations: building successful partnership with experimental biologists, data engineers, and internal/external collaborators that can lead to interdisciplinary breakthroughs. the ability to bridge the gap between computational analysis and biological experimentation is highly valued. continued learning: demonstrate a commitment to staying updated with new methodologies, technologies, and research trends is important for long-term success. key responsibilities image analysis: develop and implement algorithms and computational pipelines for the analysis of biological images, including microscopy, clinical images, and other imaging modalities. multi-omics data analysis & integration: apply state-of-the-art computational methods to analyze and integrate diverse biological datasets, including but not limited to genomics, transcriptomics, proteomics, and metabolomics data. ai and machine learning: utilize ai and machine learning algorithms to uncover patterns, correlations, and predictive models from multi-dimensional biological datasets, enabling a better understanding of biological processes and mechanisms. these may involve feature selection, dimensionality reduction, clustering, and predictive modelling. data integration: work on integrating image data with other biological data types to comprehensively understand biological systems and mechanisms. data management: design and optimize databases to efficiently store and retrieve multi-omics and image data. ensure data integrity and security while facilitating easy access for researchers. collaborative research: collaborate with experimental biologists and other researchers to design experiments, analyze data, and interpret results in a multidisciplinary environment. job qualifications masters or ph.d. in computational biology, bioinformatics, computer science, or a related field. proficiency in programming languages commonly used in computational biology, such as python, or r. experience with ai and general-purpose machine learning techniques and libraries. knowledge of database management and data integration methodologies. understanding of statistical methods for analyzing biological data. familiarity with image analysis and relevant software packages. these analyses may include image segmentation, feature extraction, object detection, and tracking. proficiency in utilizing bioinformatics databases and resources for biological data analysis. strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret complex biological data. understand historical and cutting-edge approaches in computational biology, bioinformatics, and ai and incorporate the right methodologies for the job. excellent communication skills to collaborate effectively with interdisciplinary teams and present findings to stakeholders about us we produce globally recognized brands and we grow the best business leaders in the industry. with a portfolio of trusted brands as diverse as ours, it is paramount our leaders are able to lead with courage the vast array of brands, categories and functions. we serve consumers around the world with one of the strongest portfolios of trusted, quality, leadership brands, including always , ariel , gillette , head & shoulders , herbal essences , oral-b , pampers , pantene , tampax and more. our community includes operations in approximately 70 countries worldwide. visit http://www.pg.com to know more. our consumers are diverse and our talents - internally - mirror this diversity to best serve it. that is why we re committed to building a winning culture based on inclusion and our ideal candidate is passionate about the same principle: you will join our daily effort of being in touch so we craft brands and products to improve the lives of the world s consumers now and in the future. we want you to inspire us with your unrivaled ideas. we are committed to providing equal opportunities in employment. we do not discriminate against individuals on the basis of race, color, gender, age, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, citizenship, disability, veteran status, hiv/aids status, or any other legally protected factor. job schedule full time job number r000089197 job segmentation experienced professionals (job segmentation)

4c790dc1e2a8aaa58a9903d338ce05e46702ef64.job_desc: embark on a festive cloud adventure: santa wants you cloud engineer needed in singapore! the gift of innovation awaits: this christmas, join the global financial brand that is rewriting the rules of transformation! santa is in search of a dynamic cloud engineer to be a crucial part of the it capability group, shaping the global evolution of the organization. what s under the tree for you: dive into a world of new initiatives, where automating the mundane is the name of the game. bring your automation prowess to projects infused with ai and ml magic, all while establishing a robust cloud environment. be the expert of infrastructure as code (iaac), orchestrating the cloud environment seamlessly. scale new heights with a focus on gcp, using terraform to automate like never before. navigate a multi-cloud platform, with a spotlight on up to 200 clusters utilizing kubernetes. python is your trusty companion in the automation journey. your mission, should you choose to accept: customize and configure based on diverse country governance and policies, ensuring adaptability to ever-evolving business needs. requirements for boarding this cloud sleigh: this opportunity is calling your name if: automation isn t just a skill; it s in your dna. you thrive on orchestrating cloud environments, with a focus on gcp. terraform and kubernetes are your trusted allies in the journey of automation. python is your go-to for scripting magic. why this role? the north star of opportunities awaits: join a team dedicated to transforming the global landscape. your work will be the cornerstone of automating and innovating. work on projects that blend ai, ml, and cloud wizardry. your ticket to a cloud wonderland: apply now and transform with us! alternatively you may reach out to me at ephang@welovesalt.com to arrange a private career conversation. cei no: r2093683 / ea no: 07c3147 salt is acting as an employment agency in relation to this vacancy. job information job reference: jo-2312-340226 salary: negotiable salary per: annum job duration: job start date: job industries: technology job locations: singapore job types: permanent

ebebd4bdaf9e2f5ce0f711eaba7b5dea433daffc.job_desc: line of service assurance industry/sector fs x-sector specialism risk management level intern/trainee job description & summary we at pwc believe that challenges are better solved together. that's why you'll join a diverse, global community that comes together to build trust in society and solve important problems. with us, you are encouraged to lead with your heart and values, and where your skills are developed and put to work in exciting ways, superpowered by technology. how will you value-add: we aspire to build a team of data professionals with the ability to apply their knowledge in helping our clients solve their business challenges while future proofing their business. our practice is integrated across different pwc lines of services, and works collaboratively with our clients to manage engagements and lead teams of data and analytics resources in various aspects digital, data and analytics solutions we are looking for candidates for m id-year interns from may-aug 2023 (min. 8 weeks). choose your track: there are multiple tracks within our team where you can find your niche. candidates will be assigned to the relevant roles, listed below, based on their experience and expertise. please refer to the list below for a detailed description of the roles. track a: data engineering a data engineer is responsible for collecting, managing, and transforming raw data into information that can be consumed and interpreted downstream by end users, facilitated by data scientists and business analysts. your ultimate goal is to enable organizations to utilize their data for performance evaluation and optimization. here are some of the skills and experience you may need to be effective in your role: bachelor s degree and above in analytics, information systems management, computer science or related fields 0-1 year of experience depending on grade, in data integration strategy, data modeling, designing, building etls, data ingestions, and/or transformations interest in working with rdbms such as db2, oracle, microsoft sql server, postgressql, teradata, etc. knowledge in data integration or etl tools such as informatica powercentre, oracle data integrator, sap data services, ab initio, ibm datastage or microsoft ssis process good knowledge and experience in data quality definition, data cleansing and data treatment/profiling process using industry standard tools like informatica data quality, trillium software, sas data quality, sap data quality management, etc. is an advantage good knowledge of data warehouse and data management implementation methodology good conceptual knowledge of the data management frameworks, including operating model, data governance, data management, data security, data quality and data architecture experience in big data platforms like cloudera and hortonworks knowledge in cloud technologies including aws, azure, google cloud and their respective etl specific services (eg: aws glue) knowledge in cloud data warehouses like snowflake, redshift, synapse etc. knowledge in api management software design and build good knowledge of data visualisation concepts using tools such as tableau, microsoft powerbi, qlik, etc. interest in agile methodology implementation certification in any of database, data integration, data management, visualisation tools and cloud is an added advantage knowledge about the infrastructure paradigms such as os, network, etc. is an added advantage ability to pick up new tools and able to be independent with minimal guidance from the project leads/managers strong analytical and creative problem-solving capabilities ability to establish personal credibility quickly and demonstrate expertise must be able to stay up to date on the latest trends in data analytics, like data fabric, data lakehouse, data mesh to name a few. track b: data management and governance a data management professional develops and governs data-oriented systems designed to meet the needs of an organization or research team. data management includes accessing, validating, and storing data that is needed for research and day-to-day business operations. key areas of work include data quality, metadata and masterdata management, creation of data catalogues to name a few. here are some of the skills and experience you may need to be effective in your role: a degree in technology or business-related subject is recommended (e.g. business analytics, computer science, accounting, business management) 0-1 year of relevant experience, depending on the grade applied for knowledge in financial industry will be an added advantage strong technical and analytical skill sets possess good presentation skills, both oral and written ability to interact with various levels of internal and external stakeholders both in written and verbal forms good client management skills, authoritative and credible in a client conversation - both in terms of personal style and subject matter expertise strong problem-solving skills and an ability to prioritise and manage multiple task ability to lead teams under pressure with demonstrated experience in project management willing to listen to your client and discern the best course of action for them self-driven, curious, a fast-learner and a strong practitioner of self-development must be able to stay up to date on the latest trends in data analytics, like data fabric, data lakehouse, data mesh to name a few. conceptual understanding of various data platforms, including major cloud players like aws, azure and gcp a passion for client service and an ability to work from both the pwc singapore office and client sites track c: data science a data scientist s primary job, in simple terms, is to extract actionable insights of value from data. but we expect certain more skills and qualities in the data scientists who wish to join us, like ability to work with data to get it into proper form amenable for analysis which includes data preparation/wrangling and integration experience, feature engineering business acumen so that you are able to understand the business problem, translate the requirements into technical requirements and then ensure use cases you formulate see the light of the day read on only if you think you can deliver on both of the aforementioned aspects. how will you value add: using data science methods and artificial intelligence to enhance innovation, profitability and growth of our clients in three dimensions: (1) business innovation: design and implement innovative, data-driven business models, identification, conception and assessment of industry and client specific use cases, utilization of data-modeling and -analysis in every aspect of sales, marketing, operations and business-model innovation (2) big data and analytics: extract new insights from various data sources leveraging sophisticated machine learning and ai solutions (3) digital transformation: define and implement corporate transformation as well as strategy development towards a data-driven business leveraging data science, ai, ml and digital technologies work with business and tech to develop end-to-end advanced analytics solutions, from problem formulation, data sourcing to developing and deploying the solution into production understand the business domain and relevant dataset provide end-to-end advanced solutions to design, develop and deploy to production system build mlops, ci/cd practices to manage models regarding quick experiments and feedback loop and their ultimate operationalization communicate, interpret, execute analytics results and machine learning model details with business as well as technical stakeholders about you: phd, master s or bachelor's degree in statistics, economics, computer science or other relevant fields with deep theoretical knowledge in machine learning, data mining or statistical / mathematical modelling 0-1 year experience from leading consulting organizations and/or working on transformation projects and/or in-house consulting, with proven delivery success of data science and analytics related projects and transformation programmes. proven experience in projects related to data analytics, data science and digital transformation and up-to-date on methods and technologies related to data science, artificial intelligence/machine learning and automation practical experience in solving complex problems using scientific methods and modelling approach using experimental, statistical, machine learning and visualization techniques. clear and proven project delivery expertise and client-facing experience in singapore and/or asia identify, pursue and covert a pipeline of business development opportunities leveraging sharp intellect and strong problem-solving skills to address complex client challenges proven practical interest in statistical modelling, machine learning, text mining or data visualization for use cases including segmenting, customer value modelling, marketing optimization, campaign management, pricing, image and voice recognition, fraud detection, robotics and chatbots as well as real time data capture and evaluation. proficient in the technical skills such as sql, python, pyspark, ml packages and tools knowledge in business intelligence tools and relevant statistic tools/languages (e.g. r, python, sas) as well as data storytelling and visualization skills (e.g. with tableau or qlikview) other tools/cloud platform knowledge and experience valued: alteryx, gcp, azure, aws track d: bi and data visualisation specific responsibilities include but are not limited to: perform work across diverse industries and projects ranging from developing organisational strategies for analytics to building sophisticated data architectures and analytical models analyse and interpret large volumes of data from client data systems and external sources using proprietary and open source data tools, platforms and analytical tool kits translate complex findings into simple language and communicate them to internal and external stakeholders, such as your team members and clients executives deliver excellent client service and work from both the pwc singapore office and at client sites about you degree in business analytics, computer science, computer engineering, economics, engineering, information systems, sciences, mathematics, statistics, physic or other related disciplines that possesses an analytical and quantitative component from a reputable university strong communication skills and an awareness of global trends strong preference for basic competency in two or more of the following: an analytical software (e.g. r, sas) a data visualization tool (e.g. qlik, tableau, powerbi,) a relational or graph database management tool (e.g. sql, nosql, neo4j) programming (e.g. vba, c++, java, python) distributed architectures (e.g. hdfs, mapreduce, sqoop, flume, kafka, pig, hive) a self-driven learner with the ability to quickly learn and apply new tools and techniques such as proprietary analytical software, data models and programming languages an appreciation for structured methodical research, critical thinking and problem solving skills with an understanding for the application of these skills in the business environment a natural curiosity to identify, investigate and explain trends and patterns in data an ability to analyse and break down complex concepts and technical findings into clear and simple language for communication to team members and clients a passion for emerging technologies related to big data, machine learning and ai track e: data generalist / analytics focussed business analyst (ba) a business analyst plays a key role in across the lifecycle of an analytics project, by analyzing data and providing insights that can help the stakeholders make better business decisions. as a data generalist or a business analyst, you would often work closely with data analysts to collect, clean, and analyze data from various sources, and business stakeholders to elicit analytics requirements around use cases. the ability to wear multiple hats, translate business requirements into technical requirements, drive uats and test case scenarios, guide and manager the team delivering the data analytics project will be some of the key responsibilities in your job. about you someone who has interest in at least two of the below tracks: data engineering data management data science bi and data visualisation knowledge in creating and maintaining documents like business requirements document (brd), requirements traceability matrix (rtm), functional specification document (fsd) strong analytical and problem-solving skills, as well as the demonstrated ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and effectively. track record of providing ongoing support and guidance to stakeholders to help them understand and use data effectively, like conducting adoption trainings, hackathons etc. ability to collaborate with multiple stakeholders to identify and prioritize business needs interest in developing and implementing data collection and analysis processes evaluating data to identify areas for improvement and making recommendations to senior management at least a bachelor's degree in a related field, such as business management, engineering, economics, or statistics next step: you will receive an email from us to complete pymetrics within 3 working days of your application submission. pymetrics is a series of engaging online games that will assess cognitive, behavioural and emotional traits. this allows us to learn more about you and gives us insights into where you will thrive the most in our business. note: please note we accept only one application per candidate . you may indicate your second preference in the same application. we recommend that you apply to your preferred position that closely aligns with your skills, passions and interests. you can indicate another role in the same application form. duplicate entries will slow down your application with us. kindly upload both your resume and degree audit or transcript in pdf format all under resume attachment upload kindly note only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. got a question? email to sg_graduate_recruitment@pwc.com . there have been reports of scammers impersonating pwc hr professionals contacting individuals about fraudulent job opportunities using non-pwc domain email addresses and an overseas number. please note that genuine communications from our hr team will only come from "@pwc.com" email address. 61b53d78603ab515645724ea6fd411522a731c2f.job_desc: at bifrost, we are building generative engines that allow users to create and control 3d worlds. our goal is to empower everyone to create limitless 3d worlds and images. our tool has enabled users to achieve incredible capabilities such as autonomously landing spacecraft on mars, detecting pirates in the atlantic ocean, mapping the world from space, and generating synthetic data to train ai systems 10 times faster. tl;dr build generative ai tooling to create & control 3d worlds. backed by sequoia capital tool is used to land spacecrafts on mars, nab pirates across the atlantic and enable users to build ai systems 10x faster. work with an exceptional team to solve impactful problems. curious how it works? watch a short demo here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f82gmm0_zqq houdini technical artist - remote/hybrid we are currently hiring for a technical artist with deep experience in using houdini. the ideal candidate would be an expert in procedural environment generation, but we're also open to generalists who've used houdini for procedural generation. you'll be operating as part of a team of 3d experts and contributing to our amazing generative ai tool that is changing the way that ai engineers & researchers work. qualifications at least 3 years experience in using houdini for procedural generation for environment experience we are looking for: prior experience as a lighting/shading artist on a aaa game prior experience working on photorealistic projects in games/architectural visualization/film or simulation good knowledge of 3d creation and pipeline: understanding of asset creation: modelling, surfacing, uvs, texture pipeline. experience with unreal engine soft skills communication skills are key as you ll always work in collaboration with the 3d team to understand their needs. you ll also work closely with the engineering team, making sure their requirements are fulfilled. bonus let us know if you have one or more of the following experiences: experience with usd animation or vfx experience. personal projects like making a game or short film that are rendered in real time experience with creation of hda for unreal engine knowledge of unity why bifrost? inclusive, judgement-free and safe space to be yourself small team - no red-tape and bureaucracy to wade through project ownership - take charge and unleash your skills! cool projects flexible working hours funding secured what it's like working with us enjoy a focused, dedicated working environment where we never forget how to have a bit of fun! take the opportunity to do projects outside of your comfort zone - that's where the greatest learning happens. we love out-of-the-box thinkers and problem-solvers who relish sharing, collaboration and growth. learn more about our culture here: bifrosty culture hear directly from our founders about what we do: deep tech startups in singapore join us for a front-row seat to a fast-growing early-stage startup - it's going to be a wild ride!

b8dd12334f49db94b41ba60da670f286635b2509.job_desc: we re looking for a technical - commercial engineering intern to join our apac systems and services team in singapore . working for signify means being creative and adaptive. our culture of continuous learning and commitment to diversity and inclusion creates an environment that allows you to build your skills and career. together, we re transforming our industry. as the world leader in lighting, we re constantly ahead of the curve. through our leadership in connected lighting and the internet of things, we re breaking new grounds in data analytics, ai, and smart homes, offices, cities and more! signify is one of the few companies in the world to achieve carbon neutrality and our next sustainability goals are even bolder: doubling our positive impact on the environment and society by 2025. we re on the lookout for forward-thinking innovators with a passion for sustainability. if you match this description, get in touch! what you ll do reporting directly to the head of proposal & risk management, you will be responsible for the coordination and management of the proposal management process, which includes the creation of a structured and consolidated proposal for various connected lighting solution in different applications. coordinating with system architect s to ensure that the proposed control design complies with customer requirement. coordinating with system engineer and project manager to estimate required manhours to delivery a connected lighting solution. coordinating with procurement manager to obtain correct specification and scope of works for 3rd party installation works and goods. creating cost sheet based on inputs received from various subject matter experts. creating proposal write-up complete with all the required commercial notes, technical design notes and project services notes, while at the same time able to provide value proposition , features and benefits of the proposed solution within the proposal. what you ll need currently an undergraduate majoring in engineering. customer service focus excellent communication and great interpersonal skills. ability to effectively prioritize and organize workload, multi-tasking is essential. strong in using ms office applications such as word, excel, powerpoint. basic/intermediary programming skills (powerbi, excel vba, other) commitment for full time internship for at least 5-6 months (5 days per week) what you ll get in return we re offering multiple opportunities for career development, like mentoring, coaching and stretch assignments, with strong international exposure for dynamic profiles. learning is fundamental to our culture. through continuous learning, we are transforming the industry. you have the chance to learn every day, acquire new skills and perspectives through customized online programs, and on-the-job experiences. see #signifylife through the eyes of our employees!

to boutique and large scale local and international projects. as the newest member of our team, you will have experience in a similar role and will be given a degree of autonomy and responsibility that suits a self-starting and self-reliant person who can handle the responsibility of delivering ict design and supporting multi-discipline building, critical facilities, data centres, airports, and commercial projects. you also will have opportunity to be involved in digital advisory works, providing advice and high level consultancy services to clients from various industry. what you will integration. leading the development of the design package, performance specification, functional descriptions, systems and interface management. complex design calculations using computational and network design software for lan, wan, wlan, unified communications and security systems use ms visio, powerpoint, revit, bim 360, adobe, vr and other equivalent mark-up/engineering tools for drawing production liaising with stakeholders, clients and end users to establish project requirements monitoring and overseeing installations, testing, commissioning on site developing factory acceptance testing, or site testing procedures aligned with the requirements to various projects. #li-sl1 candidate specification you will be a qualified electrical, electronics or telecommunications engineer or 52b7fd797a4f1018d1718903e8c209dbb3fd1439.job_desc: groundup.ai aims to empower every workplace to be an ai-driven company. we envision that our clients will be using our ai tools and iot devices as a base in their everyday lives. as we continue bringing our innovative approach to our fast-growing companies to create an impact in the world, we are looking for hungry and passionate electrical and iot engineers to join us on our exciting journey. this means that you will be involved in the deployment of ground-breaking solutions and products for some of the largest companies in the world, ranging from oil & gas, manufacturing, aerospace, maritime, and even the military. we value team members who execute ideas with gusto and have an insatiable appetite to win. groundup.ai has been able to achieve market leadership positions in industries we are involved in and we are able to prove our concepts rapidly. after all, we live only once and we make the best out of it. our business units have gone on to win multiple prestigious awards and recognitions from government bodies and esteemed organizations. if you are interested in joining this dynamic and creative team in this journey, we would love to speak with you. responsibilities: manage the site survey and installations of iot devices and network infrastructure provide timely and quality work progress updates to all internal colleagues work closely with the internal it team to ensure data collection and transmission to our software is stable. collect data readings from iot devices and ensure data is accurate work independently to improve our existing solutions and iot devices. ensure timely completion of projects and engineering-related activities. collaborate with the internal it team to resolve technical problems encountered during on-site survey/installation. perform in-depth troubleshooting of faults using appropriate equipment. perform other duties as required by the project teams. ensure target dates (customer ready date) for all iot projects are met so that services can be provided to customers benefits no shift work required working hours: monday friday, 10 a.m. to 7 p.m. work with exciting industries like oil & gas, military, aerospace, and artificial intelligence. build your career in a rapidly expanding, sun-rise technology industry like data science, iot and artificial intelligence. company-sponsored training and development for outstanding employees. rapid career advancement opportunities. gain insights into all relevant aspects of a high-growth start-up. supportive environment and people-oriented culture. requirements: degree in electrical/electronics/communications engineering, info-comm technology, or mechanical engineering. 0 to 2 years of working experience in telecommunications or info-communications-related industry, preferably in infrastructure rollout. enjoys a fast-paced and energetic start-up environment. strong attention to detail, organizational skills, follow-through, and results orientated. ability to deliver high-quality work independently with minimum supervision. a good team player, and a highly motivated, goal-oriented individual. resilient and comfortable taking ownership. willing to proactively learn new technology and develop new skills. excellent problem-solving, and troubleshooting skills. basic soldering skills. knowledge and understanding of electrical hardware and processes such as, but not limited to, raspberry pi. a strong interest in networking setups (dns, dhcp, firewall, gateways, routers) is a plus.

78e6f6bc5edfcb598ca4b19c037aa296597bdd1b.job_desc: we are looking for the right people people who want to innovate, achieve, grow and lead. we attract and retain the best talent by investing in our employees and empowering them to develop themselves and their careers. experience the challenges, rewards and opportunity of working for one of the world s largest providers of products and services to the global energy industry. halliburton invites qualified candidates to apply for a r&d scientist role with the signal processing center of excellence (coe) in singapore. we are looking for the right people people who want to innovate, achieve, grow, and lead. experience the challenges, rewards, and opportunity of working for one of the world s largest providers of products and services to the global energy industry. this position provides an opportunity to participate in a strategic research and development program shaping the industry s future technology. the signal processing coe at halliburton encourages a culture of continued learning, inventing, and innovating by bringing together a diverse group of top-notch scientists and engineers. our goal is to continuously grow the group s core research expertise in the area of signal and imaging processing, telemetry, modeling and inversion, high-performance computing, and ai-assisted data analytics, to maximize efficiency and values of the data, and to ensure the long-term success of halliburton. responsibilities conduct research and development on acoustic logging tools for well integrity evaluation, reservoir monitoring, or formation evaluation. development of acoustic array processing algorithms. numerical modeling of transducer responses and wave propagations in borehole environment. development of software/packages for acoustic signal processing, and borehole acoustic simulations including related multi-physics. development of ai/maching learning applications and products on acoustic downhole logs. collaborating with team members and providing necessary support for technology transfer. publising results in patent applications, technical journals and conferences. required education and skills a ph.d. (or equivalent qualification) in engineering, physics, mathematics, geophysics, or related background. 4+ years of experience as an academic or industrial technical contributor with established records. demonstrated experience or knowledge in acoustics or geophysical signal processing (seismic, distributed fibre sensing, ground penetrating radar, remote sensing). previous experience with development of acoustic surverying/downhole logging tool and technology is highly desirable. possess skills of numerical analysis and coding in matlab and python. experience with c/c++ is highly preferred. experience in high-performance computing (cpu and gpu parallelization) is a plus. demonstrated ability to conceive of and develop creative/innovative technology. demonstrated teamwork, strong communication skills, and collaborative in complex projects. **candidates having qualifications that exceed job requirements will receive consideration for higher-level roles given (1) their experience, (2) additional job requirements, and/or (3) business needs halliburton is an equal opportunity employer. employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, disability, genetic information, pregnancy, citizenship, marital status, sex/gender, sexual preference/ orientation, gender identity, age, veteran status, national origin, or any other status protected by law or regulation. location 315 jalan ahmad ibrahim, singapore, singapore, 639940, singapore job details requisition number: 176457 experience level: experienced hire job family: engineering/science/technology product service line: global r&d full time / part time: full time additional locations for this position: compensation information compensation is competitive and commensurate with experience.

13d9d0cb4cc508dd4b2703dcbf8ff4ec5fc185c5.job_desc: line of service assurance industry/sector fs x-sector specialism risk management level intern/trainee job description & summary we at pwc believe that challenges are better solved together. that's why you'll join a diverse, global community that comes together to build trust in society and solve important problems. with us, you are encouraged to lead with your heart and values, and where your skills are developed and put to work in exciting ways, superpowered by technology. how will you value-add: we aspire to build a team of data professionals with the ability to apply their knowledge in helping our clients solve their business challenges while future proofing their business. our practice is integrated across different pwc lines of services, and works collaboratively with our clients to manage engagements and lead teams of data and analytics resources in various aspects digital, data and analytics solutions we are looking for candidates for our off-cycle interns from july to december 2023 (6 months). choose your track: there are multiple tracks within our team where you can find your niche. candidates will be assigned to the relevant roles, listed below, based on their experience and expertise. please refer to the list below for a detailed description of the roles. track a: data engineering a data engineer is responsible for collecting, managing, and transforming raw data into information that can be consumed and interpreted downstream by end users, facilitated by data scientists and business analysts. your ultimate goal is to enable organizations to utilize their data for performance evaluation and optimization. here are some of the skills and experience you may need to be effective in your role: bachelor s degree and above in analytics, information systems management, computer science or related fields 0-1 year of experience depending on grade, in data integration strategy, data modeling, designing, building etls, data ingestions, and/or transformations interest in working with rdbms such as db2, oracle, microsoft sql server, postgressql, teradata, etc. knowledge in data integration or etl tools such as informatica powercentre, oracle data integrator, sap data services, ab initio, ibm datastage or microsoft ssis process good knowledge and experience in data quality definition, data cleansing and data treatment/profiling process using industry standard tools like informatica data quality, trillium software, sas data quality, sap data quality management, etc. is an advantage good knowledge of data warehouse and data management implementation methodology good conceptual knowledge of the data management frameworks, including operating model, data governance, data management, data security, data quality and data architecture experience in big data platforms like cloudera and hortonworks knowledge in cloud technologies including aws, azure, google cloud and their respective etl specific services (eg: aws glue) knowledge in cloud data warehouses like snowflake, redshift, synapse etc. knowledge in api management software design and build good knowledge of data visualisation concepts using tools such as tableau, microsoft powerbi, qlik, etc. interest in agile methodology implementation certification in any of database, data integration, data management, visualisation tools and cloud is an added advantage knowledge about the infrastructure paradigms such as os, network, etc. is an added advantage ability to pick up new tools and able to be independent with minimal guidance from the project leads/managers strong analytical and creative problem-solving capabilities ability to establish personal credibility quickly and demonstrate expertise must be able to stay up to date on the latest trends in data analytics, like data fabric, data lakehouse, data mesh to name a few. track b: data management and governance a data management professional develops and governs data-oriented systems designed to meet the needs of an organization or research team. data management includes accessing, validating, and storing data that is needed for research and day-to-day business operations. key areas of work include data quality, metadata and masterdata management, creation of data catalogues to name a few. here are some of the skills and experience you may need to be effective in your role: a degree in technology or business-related subject is recommended (e.g. business analytics, computer science, accounting, business management) 0-1 year of relevant experience, depending on the grade applied for knowledge in financial industry will be an added advantage strong technical and analytical skill sets possess good presentation skills, both oral and written ability to interact with various levels of internal and external stakeholders both in written and verbal forms good client management skills, authoritative and credible in a client conversation - both in terms of personal style and subject matter expertise strong problem-solving skills and an ability to prioritise and manage multiple task ability to lead teams under pressure with demonstrated experience in project management willing to listen to your client and discern the best course of action for them self-driven, curious, a fast-learner and a strong practitioner of self-development must be able to stay up to date on the latest trends in data analytics, like data fabric, data lakehouse, data mesh to name a few. conceptual understanding of various data platforms, including major cloud players like aws, azure and gcp a passion for client service and an ability to work from both the pwc singapore office and client sites track c: data science a data scientist s primary job, in simple terms, is to extract actionable insights of value from data. but we expect certain more skills and qualities in the data scientists who wish to join us, like ability to work with data to get it into proper form amenable for analysis which includes data preparation/wrangling and integration experience, feature engineering business acumen so that you are able to understand the business problem, translate the requirements into technical requirements and then ensure use cases you formulate see the light of the day read on only if you think you can deliver on both of the aforementioned aspects. how will you value add: using data science methods and artificial intelligence to enhance innovation, profitability and growth of our clients in three dimensions: (1) business innovation: design and implement innovative, data-driven business models, identification, conception and assessment of industry and client specific use cases, utilization of data-modeling and -analysis in every aspect of sales, marketing, operations and business-model innovation (2) big data and analytics: extract new insights from various data sources leveraging sophisticated machine learning and ai solutions (3) digital transformation: define and implement corporate transformation as well as strategy development towards a data-driven business leveraging data science, ai, ml and digital technologies work with business and tech to develop end-to-end advanced analytics solutions, from problem formulation, data sourcing to developing and deploying the solution into production understand the business domain and relevant dataset provide end-to-end advanced solutions to design, develop and deploy to production system build mlops, ci/cd practices to manage models regarding quick experiments and feedback loop and their ultimate operationalization communicate, interpret, execute analytics results and machine learning model details with business as well as technical stakeholders about you: phd, master s or bachelor's degree in statistics, economics, computer science or other relevant fields with deep theoretical knowledge in machine learning, data mining or statistical / mathematical modelling 0-1 year experience from leading consulting organizations and/or working on transformation projects and/or in-house consulting, with proven delivery success of data science and analytics related projects and transformation programmes. proven experience in projects related to data analytics, data science and digital transformation and up-to-date on methods and technologies related to data science, artificial intelligence/machine learning and automation practical experience in solving complex problems using scientific methods and modelling approach using experimental, statistical, machine learning and visualization techniques. clear and proven project delivery expertise and client-facing experience in singapore and/or asia identify, pursue and covert a pipeline of business development opportunities leveraging sharp intellect and strong problem-solving skills to address complex client challenges proven practical interest in statistical modelling, machine learning, text mining or data visualization for use cases including segmenting, customer value modelling, marketing optimization, campaign management, pricing, image and voice recognition, fraud detection, robotics and chatbots as well as real time data capture and evaluation. proficient in the technical skills such as sql, python, pyspark, ml packages and tools knowledge in business intelligence tools and relevant statistic tools/languages (e.g. r, python, sas) as well as data storytelling and visualization skills (e.g. with tableau or qlikview) other tools/cloud platform knowledge and experience valued: alteryx, gcp, azure, aws track d: bi and data visualisation specific responsibilities include but are not limited to: perform work across diverse industries and projects ranging from developing organisational strategies for analytics to building sophisticated data architectures and analytical models analyse and interpret large volumes of data from client data systems and external sources using proprietary and open source data tools, platforms and analytical tool kits translate complex findings into simple language and communicate them to internal and external stakeholders, such as your team members and clients executives deliver excellent client service and work from both the pwc singapore office and at client sites about you degree in business analytics, computer science, computer engineering, economics, engineering, information systems, sciences, mathematics, statistics, physic or other related disciplines that possesses an analytical and quantitative component from a reputable university strong communication skills and an awareness of global trends strong preference for basic competency in two or more of the following: an analytical software (e.g. r, sas) a data visualization tool (e.g. qlik, tableau, powerbi,) a relational or graph database management tool (e.g. sql, nosql, neo4j) programming (e.g. vba, c++, java, python) distributed architectures (e.g. hdfs, mapreduce, sqoop, flume, kafka, pig, hive) a self-driven learner with the ability to quickly learn and apply new tools and techniques such as proprietary analytical software, data models and programming languages an appreciation for structured methodical research, critical thinking and problem solving skills with an understanding for the application of these skills in the business environment a natural curiosity to identify, investigate and explain trends and patterns in data an ability to analyse and break down complex concepts and technical findings into clear and simple language for communication to team members and clients a passion for emerging technologies related to big data, machine learning and ai track e: data generalist / analytics focussed business analyst (ba) a business analyst plays a key role in across the lifecycle of an analytics project, by analyzing data and providing insights that can help the stakeholders make better business decisions. as a data generalist or a business analyst, you would often work closely with data analysts to collect, clean, and analyze data from various sources, and business staleholders to elicit analytics requirements around use cases. the ability to wear multiple hats, translate business requirements into technical requirements, drive uats and test case scenarios, guide and manager the team delivering the data analytics project will be some of the key responsibilities in your job. about you someone who has interest in at least two of the below tracks: 1. data engineering 2. data management 3. data science 4. bi and data visualisation knowledge in creating and maintaining documents like business requirements document (brd), requirements traceability matrix (rtm), functional specification document (fsd) strong analytical and problem-solving skills, as well as the demonstrated ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and effectively. track record of providing ongoing support and guidance to stakeholders to help them understand and use data effectively, like conducting adoption trainings, hackathons etc. ability to collaborate with multiple stakeholders to identify and prioritize business needs interest in developing and implementing data collection and analysis processes evaluating data to identify areas for improvement and making recommendations to senior management at least a bachelor's degree in a related field, such as business management, engineering, economics, or statistics next step: you will receive an email from us to complete pymetrics within 3 working days of your application submission. pymetrics is a series of engaging online games that will assess cognitive, behavioural and emotional traits. this allows us to learn more about you and gives us insights into where you will thrive the most in our business. note: please note we accept only one application per candidate . you may indicate your second preference in the same application. we recommend that you apply to your preferred position that closely aligns with your skills, passions and interests. you can indicate another role in the same application form. duplicate entries will slow down your application with us. kindly upload both your resume and degree audit or transcript in pdf format all under resume attachment upload kindly note only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. got a question? email to sg_graduate_recruitment@pwc.com . there have been reports of scammers impersonating pwc hr professionals contacting individuals about fraudulent job opportunities using non-pwc domain email addresses and an overseas number. please note that genuine communications from our hr team will only come from "@pwc.com" email address. a10d1d425d17f42278254733f781b9cd24ec3d17.job_desc: date: 31 jul 2023 location: company: please note: applying candidates are to be based locally in the following list of countries: cambodia, indonesia, thailand, vietnam key responsibilities: identify, recruit and on-board new channel partners within assigned territory. manage sales activities of partners to generate revenue. coordinate with partners to create and execute business plans to meet sales goals. analyse market trends and accordingly develop sales plans to increase brand awareness. evaluate partner sales performance and recommend improvements. educate partners about product portfolio and complimentary services offered. address partner related issues, sales conflicts and pricing issues in a timely manner. manage sales pipeline, forecast monthly sales and identify new business opportunities. develop positive working relationship with partners to build business. stay current with latest developments in marketplace and competitor activities. communicate up-to-date information about new products and enhancements to partners. develop process improvements to optimize partner management activities. work with partners to develop sale proposals, quotations, and pricings. deliver customer presentations and attend sales meetings and partner conferences. assist in partner marketing activities such as tradeshows, campaigns and other promotional activities. job requirements: possess a diploma or degree equivalent, with at least 2 years of relevant experience channels management experience for software marketing / product management candidates possessing existing suitable channel partners into various countries will be advantageous knowledgeable in fintech industry knowledgeable in financial industry businesses and solutions knowledgeable in biometrics solutions advantageous proven management of products and pricing company overview riding the wave of china s economic success in the last 2 decades, adera global group has evolved and transformed its capabilities to lead in fields of biometric authentication, automation, digitalization, secured data handling, data analytics and smart technologies. we support customers from different industries worldwide, ranging from banks, insurance companies, government agencies, health and telecommunications. under the visionary leadership of our founder cum group chairman mr lennon tan and his leaders, adera has come a long way from its humble beginnings as a specialty card manufacturer. today, adera is a diversified group of companies, employing over 2,000 employees, including 200 r&d engineers over 20 offices. adera re-located its global headquarters to singapore in 2015 and in the same landmark year, we also completed the acquisition of datapost and jk trudata solutions. adera has come a long way since its inception in 1984. in our group latest transformation, we embarked on a new strategic direction. with clear focus on our customers needs, we consolidated technologies and knowhow via a more agile product development approach we are now able to offer a complete suite of solutions to banks, fis & government sectors. our sectors especially in the payment and transactions arena are constantly changing with new technologies and regulatory changes. focus on our core competence of trusted manufacturing and services, we are now able to deliver both secured products like next gen smartcards, mobile transactional and pos applications, banking automation kiosks and cloud based bpo services to our customers. with the addition of datapost group in 2015, we have a great platform to service international banks more effectively. i look forward to the realization of adera being a significant and trusted supplier to banking and fi customers globally. the speed of the change in our industry is challenging yet presents many new opportunities. our diversity in new products, technology, and heavy investment in research development will enable us to sustain our competitive edge. our commitment to provide a positive work environment for our staff enables them to excel and deliver trusted quality products to our customers. we constantly seek and continuously strengthen partnerships with our strategic alliances and industry leaders to fulfill our commitment to the industry.

495abb956347b0a90f65d8a263264087a1bd0c5e.job_desc: job title: technical lead summary: we are seeking a highly skilled and experienced senior software engineer to join our dynamic team. as a senior software engineer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality software solutions. you will work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative and efficient software applications. roles and responsibilities: 1. design, develop, and maintain software applications using react.js, node.js, and javascript. 2. collaborate with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and translate them into technical specifications. 3. write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following best practices and coding standards. 4. conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to ensure code quality and adherence to architectural guidelines. 5. troubleshoot and debug software defects and performance issues, identifying and implementing appropriate solutions. 6. collaborate with team members to continuously improve software development processes and practices. 7. stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends, and apply them to enhance software development practices.

f2b91518d005ecf8d761bd060c06d50c459d6694.job_desc: what if you can safeguard the future of all technologies? today, most of the systems are connected, automated, and remotely monitored/controlled. be it industrial or commercial, automation with connectivity has a huge impact on evolving sectors including healthtech, industry 4.0, satellite, defense/military, 5g, and smart cities. these are prone to cyberattacks due to various limitations in computation, bandwidth, and advances in quantum computing. microsec (www.usec.io) is a fast-growing singapore-based company that has built an enterprise cybersecurity platform that protects against such attacks by facilitating mathematical and computationally optimized encryption algorithms supporting post-quantum cryptography with machine learning. to protect from zero-day attacks, the platform also enables a machine-learning/ai-based anomaly detection system that can run on the smallest microcontrollers to the largest supercomputers. an incredible team of various scientists and engineers from across the world has joined the incredible journey to build this technology. the team is looking for its next rockstar candidates to take the company to the next level and safeguard the future of all technologies. microsec (www.usec.io) is looking for a driven, passionate, and outgoing cybersecurity sales manager for its fast-growing iot & ot cybersecurity business. this person should be naturally very curious, loves technology, and is b2b-minded. this person will hunt/manage leads, set up distribution channels, and close end customers. what you ll do sales & business development look for new customers, build an effective pipeline and identify opportunities for microsec cybersecurity product suites analyze market trends for ot & iot cybersecurity; do competitor analysis; identify unique propositions for customers to add value develop and implement sales strategies for new customers and nurture existing business prioritizing key accounts and establishing strong contacts with existing customers and growing the business within the account create sales & solution proposals; and make presentation slides for customers drive the entire sales process from targeting accounts, identifying solutions and to closing the sale articulating the value of microsec product suite offerings to commercial prospects updating crm and submission of weekly reports reporting back to the microsec management team work cross-functionally within the company to communicate with all stakeholders to ensure customers' success working towards key performance targets support the marketing team in providing relevant materials for publishing provide feedback to the microsec product team regarding feature requests and customer feedback analyze market trends for iot & ot cybersecurity and do competitor analysis participating in events and conferences to generate leads who you are must have more than 6 years of work experience as a cybersecurity sales manager or relevant role in the cybersecurity domain experience selling integrated cyber security solutions in large or complex deals in the commercial sector ($500k+) to achieve revenue/sales targets must have knowledge of relevant cybersecurity products, solutions and verticals in the domain of industrial control systems and enterprises must have knowledge of cybersecurity technologies like pki, intrusion detection systems, etc. must have an extensive network of partners in the cybersecurity domain must have an extensive network in various verticals of ot & iot industries strong record of delivering commercial kpis and year on year growth able to build and execute on an account plan with a security approach able to conduct product demonstrations and apply solution-centric sales methodology experience in selling integrated cyber security solutions (hardware with software products) in large or complex deals in the commercial sector able to fluently speak and write in english language (mandarin and malay will be a plus) you possess startup dna, which means you re a hustler and thrive in establishing structure amidst ambiguity strong business skills and knowledge. must have a deep understanding of typical enterprise cybersecurity technology business models and gtm strategies across multiple disciplines including field sales, indirect sales, marketing, and post-sales customer success / professional services superior analytical and problem-solving skills with a focus on attention to detail, pattern recognition, insight generation and the ability to process information quickly to deliver against tight deadlines you have the ability to establish trust quickly, whether that be with customers, partners, peers and team strong ability to lead cross-functional teams through influence determination to own the outcome and be self-motivated and directed good interpersonal, communication and presentation skills

803fa2c82d2768de3fac8c31fd3b07af2042c094.job_desc: job role summary we are seeking a highly motivated and experienced lead / senior frontend software engineer to develop exciting generative ai (genai) products. candidates should have at least 5 years of experience in front-end development, and experience in large-scale system front-end architecture and implementation is preferred. as a lead / senior frontend software engineer, you will work with other teams to ensure the smooth progress of product iterations, continuously improve the user experience of the product through in-depth understanding of the business and products, and use technology to drive business growth. your expertise will help perfect our products and achieve our vision. responsibilities responsible for the front-end overall architecture design, web application development and code implementation of genai products. cooperate with other teams to jointly ensure the smooth software delivery and fast iteration of products. understand the business and products in depth, continuously improve the user experience of products, and use technology to drive business growth. pay attention to cutting-edge technology trends and latest research, maintain the overall technological advancement of the front-end team, and provide relevant technical guidance to junior team members. qualifications bachelor/master degree or above in computer or software related majors. more than 5 years of experience in front-end development, experience in large-scale system front-end architecture and implementation is preferred. proven experience as a frontend web developer, with expertise in major web technologies and multiple programming languages, such as typescript, javascript, node.js, react and redux, go, python, etc. have a certain understanding of mainstream front-end frameworks (react/vue/angular, etc.), and have in-depth application of at least one of them. have practical understanding and practical experience in implementing web applications with high performance, high availability, and excellent user experience. have a good understanding of back-end technology, and experience in back-end development is preferred. (e.g., experience developing backend-for-frontend apis using node.js). be a team player, have an optimistic and cheerful personality, have strong adaptability, be able to actively face pressure, and have good service awareness and cross-team collaboration skills. have good english reading, writing and communication skills. candidates who are familiar with genai products in the industry and/or have genai r&d experience will be given priority. benefits competitive salary and compensation package fast career development and growth opportunities excellent team culture and stimulating working environment how to apply: personal particulars education background work experiences in point forms all reasons for leaving current and expected salary date of availability / notice period we regret that only shortlisted candidates would be notified. your profile may be kept in our database for more career opportunities. we wish you all the best in your job search. contact us at email: hr@hypergai.com

e52ca5276da62f40d5403ba8de9b02c74054dd31.job_desc: meet ascenda ascenda solutions make loyalty simple for financial institutions globally. previously, these companies had to endure complex patchworks of third-party systems, complicated data experiences, and 18-month implementation projects to deploy a competitive rewards program. we turn things upside down with loyalty solutions rooted in beautiful design, exceptional customer value, and rapid self-service implementation. about authorizations our authorizations team sits at the heart of a distributed system, and plays a role in almost all interactions in our loyalty product. you ll work with banks & fintechs around the world to enable secure yet flexible access, authentication, and automation that transforms how customers use our rewards platforms, putting identity at the heart of the banks security and growth we make access to applications safe, secure, and seamless for the millions of users around the world. our zero trust approach to identity enables us to partner banks & their vendors to deliver customised yet secure loyalty experiences for our clients. this team is now focused on supercharging our next phase of growth with enabling ecosystem level configurability. you ll join a team of diverse & talented people solving interesting challenges around configurations, onboarding, observability & event driven processes that forms the backbone of ascenda's security architecture for hundreds of partners globally. join us as a staff engineer, authorizations. as a member on the authorizations team, you will: craft secure, performant, cross-app & platform applications for our rewards consumers & internal banking teams play a key role in driving day-to-day work such as sprint planning, pair programming, technical mentorship, and code reviews. partner our tpm organisation & clients to map business requirements onto existing systems, and craft upgrades to our authn, authz & iam architecture with all ascenda services, including but not limited to compute, storage, db and our ml/ai systems. partner our engineering managers to define and execute on the technical roadmap to continuously tighten the security posture of overall ascenda ecosystem & infrastructure. handle production incidents and improve operational processes, monitoring, and tooling to minimize their impact. have the opportunity to solve problems across multiple areas, such as performance, internationalization, multi-tenancy & scalability you ll be an excellent fit with us if you re strong technical background, with prior experience in similar roles such as tech lead, engineering manager or staff level engineering roles experience building large-scale, high throughput distributed systems on the cloud. hands on experience with event-driven architectures proven expertise in distributed systems, data-driven solutions, and exposure to large scale security, identity and access control projects you are self-motivated and function well in situations with high levels of ambiguity. you prefer simple solutions and designs over complex ones, and have a good intuition for what will last and scale. have experience in developing technical roadmaps/rfcs to communicate technical strategy and vision have at least 7 years of software development experience

& laser systems. experience in beam characterization using commercially available equipment, e.g. spiricon m2 instrument & ophir beam profiler. experience in using multi-meter, function generator and oscilloscope. ability to read and understand mechanical drawings and electrical wiring diagrams. hands on experience using 3d cad software for simple jig/fixture design will be an added advantage. good working knowledge of ms excel, ms powerpoint and ms words is essential. requirement: experience in programming (e.g. python, c#, vba, data analytics, database, etc) will be an added advantage. player yet able to work independently and with minimal supervision. willing to travel overseas when required. bachelor's degree and above in laser, optic, or electro-optical engineering. candidates with a degree in industrial or manufacturing engineering and with experience in the manufacturing of laser systems will also be considered. all successful candidates can expect a very competitive remuneration package and a comprehensive range of benefits. please email your resume in a detailed ms word format to joyce@peopleprofilers.com stating 1) current drawn 2) expecting salary 3) date
